trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for controls, which are components with visual representation.
trans-unit.target: 定义控件，是带有可视化表示形式的组件的基类。

trans-unit.source: To create your own control class, inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>, Control classes, or from the other Windows Forms provided controls.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建你自己的控件类，从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>、 控件类，或从其他 Windows 窗体提供的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about authoring custom controls, see [Developing Custom Windows Forms Controls with the .NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创作自定义控件的详细信息，请参阅[开发自定义 Windows 窗体控件与.NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The Control class implements very basic functionality required by classes that display information to the user.
trans-unit.target: 控件类实现由向用户显示信息的类所需的最基本功能。

trans-unit.source: It handles user input through the keyboard and pointing devices.
trans-unit.target: 它处理通过键盘和指针设备的用户输入。

trans-unit.source: It handles message routing and security.
trans-unit.target: 它处理的消息路由和安全性。

trans-unit.source: It defines the bounds of a control (its position and size), although it does not implement painting.
trans-unit.target: 它定义控件边界的 （其位置和大小），尽管它未实现绘制。

trans-unit.source: It provides a window handle (`hWnd`).
trans-unit.target: 它提供的窗口句柄 (`hWnd`)。

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms controls use ambient properties so child controls can appear like their surrounding environment.
trans-unit.target: Windows 窗体控件使用环境属性，因此子控件的外观接近其周围的环境。

trans-unit.source: An *ambient property* is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: *环境属性*是控件的属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。

trans-unit.source: If the control does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>, and the property is not set, the control attempts to determine the value of the ambient property through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Site%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件不具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>，和未设置的属性、 控件尝试确定通过环境属性的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Site%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Site%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the control is not sited, if the site does not support ambient properties, or if the property is not set on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>, the control uses its own default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件不占位，如果站点不支持环境属性，或在未设置的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>，该控件使用其自己的默认值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: Typically, an ambient property represents a characteristic of a control, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, that is communicated to a child control.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，环境属性均表示一个控件的特征如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>，即传递给子控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>都不具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>作为其父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>默认情况下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: Ambient properties provided by the Controlclass include: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的 Controlclass 的环境属性包括︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To make your Windows Forms application support visual styles, be sure to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> property to `System` and include a manifest with your executable.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 若要使 Windows 窗体应用程序支持视觉样式，请务必设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>属性`System`并包含可执行文件清单。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: A manifest is an XML file that is included either as a resource within your application executable or as a separate file that resides in the same directory as the executable file.
trans-unit.target: 清单是 XML 文件，包括作为应用程序可执行文件中的资源或者为单独的文件驻留在可执行文件所在的同一目录中。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a manifest, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关清单的示例，请参阅示例部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using visual styles, see[Visual Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb773187.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用视觉样式的详细信息，请参阅[视觉样式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb773187.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms has accessibility support built in, and provides information about your application that enables it to work with accessibility client applications such as screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities.
trans-unit.target: Windows 窗体具有辅助功能支持内置的并提供有关使它可与辅助功能客户端应用程序，如屏幕放大器和查看器实用程序的应用程序信息、 语音输入实用工具、 屏幕键盘、 其他输入的设备，以及键盘增强实用工具。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you will want to provide additional information to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 有时想要为辅助功能客户端应用程序提供附加信息。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of providing this additional information.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法来提供这些额外信息。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A>将报告给具有辅助功能客户端应用程序的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used to provide limited accessibility information for existing controls.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常用于提供有限的辅助功能信息的现有控件。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can write your own class deriving from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes, providing as much accessibility information as needed.
trans-unit.target: 此外，你可以编写您自己的类派生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>类，提供所需任意数量的可访问性信息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To maintain better performance, do not set the size of a control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 为了保持更好的性能，请执行不控件的大小其构造函数中设置。

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 首选的方法是重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not add data bindings for a Control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 不要在其构造函数中添加数据绑定控件。

trans-unit.source: Doing so will cause errors in code generation and can cause unwanted behavior.
trans-unit.target: 这样会导致出现错误，生成代码，并可能导致意外的行为。

trans-unit.source: The majority of the controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms> namespace use the underlying Windows common control as a base to build on.
trans-unit.target: 中的控件的大部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms>命名空间将基础的 Windows 公共控件用作的基础上生成。</xref:System.Windows.Forms>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Windows common controls, see[General Control Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb775497.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关 Windows 公共控件的详细信息，请参阅[常规控件参考](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb775497.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: To identify Windows Forms controls from a separate process, use a standard `SendMessage` call to pass the WM_GETCONTROLNAME message.
trans-unit.target: 若要标识 Windows 窗体控件从一个单独的进程，使用一种标准`SendMessage`调用即可传递 WM_GETCONTROLNAME 消息。

trans-unit.source: WM_GETCONTROLNAME is independent of the language and Windows hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: WM_GETCONTROLNAME 是独立于语言和 Windows 层次结构。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Recommended Solution for Windows Forms" topic in[Automating Windows Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms996405.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"建议解决方案的 Windows 窗体"主题[自动执行 Windows 窗体](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms996405.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property to synchronize access to the control from multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>属性的访问进行同步到控件从多个线程。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about multithreaded Windows Forms controls, see [How to: Make Thread-Safe Calls to Windows Forms Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: 有关多线程 Windows 窗体控件的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 向 Windows 窗体控件进行线程安全的调用](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> class with default settings.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>类使用默认设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class is the base class for all controls used in a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类是在 Windows 窗体应用程序中使用的所有控件的基类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this constructor is typically not called directly but is instead called by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 因为此类通常不用于创建类的实例，此构造函数通常不直接调用，但而由派生类调用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> class with specific text.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>具有特定文本的类。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类是在 Windows 窗体应用程序中使用的所有控件的基类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.target: 构造函数还将控件添加到父控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: The value is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，值赋给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the accessibility client applications of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"></xref> for the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: 通知辅助功能客户端应用程序指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"></xref>指定的子控件。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> the accessibility client applications are to be notified of.
trans-unit.target: 必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法为每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>辅助功能客户端应用程序将接收的通知。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method is typically called when a property is set or from within an event handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A>方法通常称为属性时设置或从事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method and pass in an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> value of `Hide` from within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能会调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A>方法并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>值`Hide`从内的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"></xref> to notify the accessibility client applications of.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"> </xref>以通知可访问性的客户端应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The child <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to notify of the accessible event.
trans-unit.target: 子<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>要通知的可访问的事件。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the accessibility client applications of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"></xref> for the specified child control .
trans-unit.target: 通知辅助功能客户端应用程序指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"></xref>指定的子控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"></xref> to notify the accessibility client applications of.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents"> </xref>以通知可访问性的客户端应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 标识符<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The child <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to notify of the accessible event.
trans-unit.target: 子<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>要通知的可访问的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>分配给该控件。

trans-unit.source: To control the instance returned from this method, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制从此方法返回的实例，重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>当前分配到该控件，创建一个新实例。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the AccessibilityObject property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 若要获取或设置 AccessibilityObject 属性，必须添加对引用`Accessibility`与安装程序集[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see [Active Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关辅助性对象的详细信息，请参阅[Active Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>分配给该控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default action description of the control for use by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于控件的默认操作说明，供具有辅助功能客户端应用程序。

trans-unit.source: An object's AccessibleDefaultActionDescription property describes the object's primary method of manipulation from the user's viewpoint.
trans-unit.target: 对象的 AccessibleDefaultActionDescription 属性描述对象的主要方法从用户的角度来看的操作。

trans-unit.source: This property should be a verb or a short verb phrase.
trans-unit.target: 此属性应为一个谓词或谓词短语。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Not all objects have default actions, and some objects might have a default action that is related to its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, such as in the following examples: - A selected check box has a default action of "Uncheck" and a value of "Checked."
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 并非所有对象都有默认操作，而某些对象可能都具有与相关的默认操作其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，例如，下面的示例:-选中的复选框，并且在"请先取消选中"默认操作的值为"已选中。"</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - A cleared check box has a default action of "Check" and a value of "Unchecked."
trans-unit.target: -A 清除的复选框还具有默认操作的"检查"和"未选中。"的值

trans-unit.source: - A button labeled "Print" has a default action of "Press," with no value.
trans-unit.target: -一个标有"打印"按钮将"Press，"默认操作不具有任何值。

trans-unit.source: - A label or a text box control that shows "Printer" has no default action, but would have a value of "Printer."
trans-unit.target: -A 标签或显示"打印机"的一个文本框控件没有默认操作，但是"打印机。"的值

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see [Content of Descriptive Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关辅助性对象的属性的详细信息，请参阅[的描述性属性内容](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The default action description of the control for use by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 辅助功能客户端应用程序使用的控件的默认操作说明。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the description of the control used by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置辅助功能客户端应用程序使用的控件说明。

trans-unit.source: An object's AccessibleDescription property provides a textual description about an object's visual appearance.
trans-unit.target: 对象的 AccessibleDescription 属性提供有关对象的可视外观的文本说明。

trans-unit.source: The description is primarily used to provide greater context for low-vision or blind users, but can also be used for context searching or other applications.
trans-unit.target: 描述主要用于提供更大的上下文对于视力较差或盲人用户，但还可用于上下文搜索或其他应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The AccessibleDescription property is needed if the description is not obvious, or if it is redundant based on the object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: AccessibleDescription 属性是说明不很明显，如果需要或如果它是冗余基于对象的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a button with "OK" would not need additional information, but a button that shows a picture of a cactus would.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一个具有"确定"按钮将不需要的其他信息，但会显示的兰图片的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> (and perhaps <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help%2A>) properties for the cactus button would describe its purpose, but the AccessibleDescription property would convey information that is less tangible, such as "A button that shows a picture of a cactus."
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A>(，也可能<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help%2A>) 兰按钮的属性将描述其用途，但 AccessibleDescription 属性传达不太明确，例如"显示图片的兰的按钮。"的信息</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see [Content of Descriptive Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关辅助性对象的属性的详细信息，请参阅[的描述性属性内容](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The description of the control used by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 辅助功能客户端应用程序使用的控件说明。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the control used by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置辅助功能客户端应用程序使用的控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The AccessibleName property is a label that briefly describes and identifies the object within its container, such as the text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, the name of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, or a label displayed next to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: AccessibleName 属性是一个标签，简要描述并标识其容器，例如中的文本中的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>，则名称<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>，或旁边显示标签<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see the "[Content of Descriptive Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关辅助性对象的属性的详细信息，请参阅"[内容的描述性属性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control used by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 辅助功能客户端应用程序使用的控件名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accessible role of the control
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的可访问角色

trans-unit.source: The AccessibleRole property describes what kind of user interface element an object is.
trans-unit.target: AccessibleRole 属性描述对象是哪种类型的用户界面元素。

trans-unit.source: If the control's role cannot be determined, the AccessibleRole property is set to `Default`.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法确定控件的角色，AccessibleRole 属性设置为`Default`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see [Content of Descriptive Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关辅助性对象的属性的详细信息，请参阅[的描述性属性内容](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Default" name="Default" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Default" name="Default" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control can accept data that the user drags onto it.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否可以接受用户拖放到它上面的数据。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if drag-and-drop operations are allowed in the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果在控件; 允许拖放操作否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the edges of the container to which a control is bound and determines how a control is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置到的控件绑定，并确定控件的大小调整随其父级容器的边缘。

trans-unit.source: Use the Anchor property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 定位点属性用于定义如何调整控件的自动调整其父控件的大小时。

trans-unit.source: Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 锚定到其父控件的控件，可确保时调整父控件的锚定的边缘保留在父控件的同一位置相对于边缘。

trans-unit.source: You can anchor a control to one or more edges of its container.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定位到其容器的一个或多个边缘的控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> whose Anchor property value is set to `Top` and `Bottom`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> is stretched to maintain the anchored distance to the top and bottom edges of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is increased.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>其定位点属性值设置为`Top`和`Bottom`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>拉伸以维护之间的边缘和下边缘的锚定的距离<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>增加。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Anchor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 定位点和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>属性是互相排斥。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个可以设置一次和最后一个组将优先。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Top" name="Top" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Left" name="Left" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Top" name="Top" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Left" name="Left" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets where this control is scrolled to in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此控件滚动到何处<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView*>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> specifying the scroll location.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>指定滚动位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is the upper-left corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: 默认为控件的左上角。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: The BackColor property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: BackColor 属性不支持透明的颜色，除非`SupportsTransparentBackColor`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The BackColor property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: BackColor 属性是一个环境属性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same BackColor as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>将具有为其父级将相同的背景色<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>默认情况下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>类或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类概述。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，表示控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在控件中显示的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: - Use the BackgroundImage property to place a graphic image onto a control.
trans-unit.target: -使用 BackgroundImage 属性将图形图像拖动到控件上。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Images with translucent or transparent colors are not supported by Windows Forms controls as background images.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 作为背景图像的 Windows 窗体控件不支持具有透明或透明的颜色的映像。

trans-unit.source: > > This property is not supported on child controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: >> 不支持此属性的子控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that represents the image to display in the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> ，表示要在控件背景中显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置中定义的背景图像布局<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: Use the BackgroundImageLayout property to specify the position and behavior of an image you have placed onto a control.
trans-unit.target: BackgroundImageLayout 属性用于指定的位置和行为的已放到控件上的映像。

trans-unit.source: BackgroundImageLayout takes effect only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: BackgroundImageLayout 才会生效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A>属性设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can increase performance for large images if you set BackgroundImageLayout to something other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout>.
trans-unit.target: 如果 BackgroundImageLayout 设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout>以外，则可以提高大型图像的性能

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> (<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> , <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> (<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> , <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>).

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> is the default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref>是默认值。

trans-unit.source: The specified enumeration value does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定的枚举值不存在。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImageLayout*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property changes either programmatically or by user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>属性更改以编程方式或由用户交互。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously on the thread that the control's underlying handle was created on.
trans-unit.target: 在创建控件的基础句柄的线程上异步执行指定的委托。

trans-unit.source: The delegate is called asynchronously, and this method returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 以异步方式调用的委托，此方法将立即返回。

trans-unit.source: You can call this method from any thread, even the thread that owns the control's handle.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从任何线程，即使拥有控件的句柄的线程调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的句柄尚不存在，此方法搜索沿控件的父链中，直到它找到的控件或窗体具有窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: If no appropriate handle can be found, BeginInvoke will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到任何合适的句柄，BeginInvoke 将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions within the delegate method are considered untrapped and will be sent to the application's untrapped exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 此委托方法中的异常被视为未，将发送到应用程序的未捕获的异常处理程序。

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> to retrieve the return value from the delegate, if neccesary, but this is not required.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>如果必要，但这不是必需的委托，检索返回值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> will block until the return value can be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>将阻止，直到可以检索返回值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Most methods on a control can only be called from the thread where the control was created.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 控件上的大多数方法可以仅从调用线程已创建该控件创建。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, BeginInvoke, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: 除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>属性，在控件上都是线程安全的四种方法︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>，BeginInvoke， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>是否已创建控件句柄。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>在后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致跨线程调用的非法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有其他方法调用，你应使用 invoke 方法之一进行封送处理对控件的线程的调用。

trans-unit.source: The invoke methods always invoke their callbacks on the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: Invoke 方法始终调用控件的线程上其回调。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果应处理该消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能引发异常。

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 不带参数的方法的委托。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that represents the result of the BeginInvoke operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>表示 BeginInvoke 操作的结果。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: No appropriate window handle can be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到合适的窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously with the specified arguments, on the thread that the control's underlying handle was created on.
trans-unit.target: 在创建控件的基础句柄的线程上执行异步使用指定的参数，指定的委托。

trans-unit.source: The delegate is called asynchronously, and this method returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: 以异步方式调用的委托，此方法将立即返回。

trans-unit.source: You can call this method from any thread, even the thread that owns the control's handle.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从任何线程，即使拥有控件的句柄的线程调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的句柄尚不存在，此方法搜索沿控件的父链中，直到它找到的控件或窗体具有窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: If no appropriate handle can be found, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到任何合适的句柄，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>将引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Exceptions within the delegate method are considered untrapped and will be sent to the application's untrapped exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 此委托方法中的异常被视为未，将发送到应用程序的未捕获的异常处理程序。

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> to retrieve the return value from the delegate, if neccesary, but this is not required.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>如果必要，但这不是必需的委托，检索返回值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> will block until the return value can be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>将阻止，直到可以检索返回值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Most methods on a control can only be called from the thread where the control was created.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 控件上的大多数方法可以仅从调用线程已创建该控件创建。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: 除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>属性，在控件上都是线程安全的四种方法︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>是否已创建控件句柄。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>在后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致跨线程调用的非法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有其他方法调用，你应使用 invoke 方法之一进行封送处理对控件的线程的调用。

trans-unit.source: The invoke methods always invoke their callbacks on the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: Invoke 方法始终调用控件的线程上其回调。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果应处理该消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能引发异常。

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes parameters of the same number and type that are contained in the `args` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 采用的相同的数量和中包含的类型参数的方法的委托`args`参数。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: 要将作为自变量传递给给定方法的对象数组。

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no arguments are needed.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果不需要参数。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that represents the result of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*> operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>表示的结果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*>操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*> </xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: No appropriate window handle can be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到合适的窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is used to return a single<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> for all data-bound controls contained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>用于返回单个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>所包含的所有数据绑定控件</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>的</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> keeps all controls that are bound to the same data source synchronized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>绑定到同一数据源同步的所有控件都保持。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> specifies the item in the underlying list that all data-bound controls point to.
trans-unit.target: 例如，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>所有数据绑定控件所都指向的基础列表中指定的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> and assigning it to the BindingContext property, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关创建新的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>和将其分配给 BindingContext 属性，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>的详细信息

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"> </xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext"></xref>属性更改。

trans-unit.source: To add a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>属性，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property is changed is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance, in pixels, between the bottom edge of the control and the top edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: 获取以像素为单位，控件下的边缘与其容器的工作区上边缘之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is equal to the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> property value, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值等于的总和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>属性值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Bottom property is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: 底部属性是只读的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate this property value by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> properties or calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过更改的值来操作此属性的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>属性或调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the distance, in pixels, between the bottom edge of the control and the top edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>表示以像素为单位，控件下的边缘与其容器的工作区上边缘之间的距离。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size and location of the control including its nonclient elements, in pixels, relative to the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的大小和位置，包括其非工作区元素，以像素为单位，相对于父控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: The bounds of the control include the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus.
trans-unit.target: 控件的控件边界包括如滚动条、 边框、 标题栏和菜单的非工作区元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> method is called to set the Bounds property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>方法调用来设置边界属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Boundsproperty is not always changed through its `set` method so you should override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> method to ensure that your code is executed when the Bounds property is set.
trans-unit.target: 通过不总是更改 Boundsproperty 其`set`方法，以便应重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>方法，以确保边界属性设置时，执行你的代码。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in pixels relative to the parent control that represents the size and location of the control including its nonclient elements.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>以相对于父控件表示的大小和位置，包括其非工作区元素的控件的像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: Brings the control to the front of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: 将控件带到 z 顺序的前面。

trans-unit.source: The control is moved to the front of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: 控件移动到 z 顺序的前面。

trans-unit.source: If the control is a child of another control, the child control is moved to the front of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件是另一个控件的子级，则移动子控件的到 z 顺序的前面。

trans-unit.source: BringToFront does not make a control a top-level control, and it does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: BringToFront 不会进行一个顶级控件，并不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*> property can be set to an active value, to enable IME support.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>属性可以设置为活动值的值，，以启用 IME 支持。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override this property to return `false` if IME is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类可以重写此属性以返回`false`如果 IME 不受支持。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control can receive focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否可以接收焦点。

trans-unit.source: In order for a control to receive input focus, the control must have a handle assigned to it, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> properties must both be set to `true` for both the control and all its parent controls, and the control must be a form or the control's outermost parent must be a form.
trans-unit.target: 在要接收输入的焦点的控件的顺序，控件必须具有向其分配、 的句柄和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>属性必须都设置为`true`控件和所有父控件和控件必须是一个窗体或控件的最外层父项必须是一个窗体。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control can receive focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该控件可以接收焦点，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines if events can be raised on the control.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可以在控件上引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If this control is being hosted as an ActiveX control, this property will return `false` if the ActiveX control has its events frozen.
trans-unit.target: 如果此控件要承载作为 ActiveX 控件，则此属性将返回`false`如果 ActiveX 控件拥有冻结其事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is hosted as an ActiveX control whose events are not frozen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件承载 ActiveX 控件作为其事件未，冻结;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以选中控件。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` if the `Selectable` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `true`, is contained in another control, the control itself is visible and enabled, and all its parent controls are visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`true`如果`Selectable`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>设置为`true`、 包含在另一个控件，该控件本身是可见的且已启用，和所有其父控件是否可见且已启用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable and will return a value of `false` for the CanSelect property.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表中的 Windows 窗体控件不是可选择并将返回的值`false`CanSelect 属性。

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from these controls are also not selectable.
trans-unit.target: 派生自这些控件的控件也是不可选的。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control)
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>（当不存在控件中的链接）</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control can be selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件可以选中，;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control has captured the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否已捕获鼠标。

trans-unit.source: When a control has captured the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders.
trans-unit.target: 当控件已捕获鼠标时，它指示光标在其边框内将接收鼠标输入。

trans-unit.source: The mouse is typically only captured during drag operations.
trans-unit.target: 在拖动操作期间通常仅捕获了鼠标。

trans-unit.source: Only the foreground window can capture the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 只有前台窗口可以捕获鼠标。

trans-unit.source: When a background window attempts to do so, the window receives messages only for mouse events that occur when the mouse cursor is within the visible portion of the window.
trans-unit.target: 当后台窗口尝试这样做时，窗口只接收的消息时发生鼠标光标位于窗口的可见部分的鼠标事件。

trans-unit.source: Also, even if the foreground window has captured the mouse, the user can still click another window, bringing it to the foreground.
trans-unit.target: 此外，即使前景窗口已捕获鼠标，用户仍可以单击另一个窗口，使其变为前台。

trans-unit.source: When the mouse is captured, shortcut keys should not work.
trans-unit.target: 当捕获鼠标时，不应处理键盘快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has captured the mouse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件已捕获鼠标;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control causes validation to be performed on any controls that require validation when it receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否导致上任何控件进行验证，在接收焦点时执行验证。

trans-unit.source: If the CausesValidation property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果这属性设置为`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>事件将被抑制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>

trans-unit.source: The CausesValidation property value is typically set to `false` for controls such as a Help button.
trans-unit.target: 这属性值通常设置为`false`控件如帮助按钮。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control causes validation to be performed on any controls requiring validation when it receives focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件引起在接收焦点，则时需要验证任何控件上执行验证的否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the focus or keyboard user interface (UI) cues change.
trans-unit.target: 焦点或键盘用户界面 (UI) 提示更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to catch calls on the wrong thread that access a control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*> property when an application is being debugged.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否捕获对错误线程的访问的控件的调用调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*>属性在调试应用程序时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*>

trans-unit.source: When a thread other than the creating thread of a control tries to access one of that control's methods or properties, it often leads to unpredictable results.
trans-unit.target: 当创建控件的线程的线程尝试访问该控件的方法或属性之一时，它通常会导致不可预知的结果。

trans-unit.source: A common invalid thread activity is a call on the wrong thread that accesses the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通常，无效的线程活动是访问控件的对错误线程的调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set CheckForIllegalCrossThreadCalls to `true` to find and diagnose this thread activity more easily while debugging.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 CheckForIllegalCrossThreadCalls`true`来查找和在调试时更轻松地诊断此线程活动。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if calls on the wrong thread are caught; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果捕获了对错误线程的调用;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 当单击控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The Click event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 单击事件传递<xref:System.EventArgs>给其事件处理程序中，因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （按钮、 单击、 鼠标轮旋转或位置的数），使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>如果单击引起操作不是鼠标，如按 ENTER 键操作，将不会引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以设置单击鼠标按钮它认为是双击而不是两次单击之间的时间。

trans-unit.source: The Click event is raised every time a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 每次双击控件时，将引发单击事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the Click and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the Click and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有为单击事件处理程序和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，单击和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>双击窗体，这两种方法调用时将引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the Click event might be raised twice.
trans-unit.target: 如果双击控件时，控件不支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件，可能引发事件两次单击。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: You must set the `StandardClick` value of<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> to `true` for this event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置`StandardClick`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>到`true`会引发此事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The following events are not raised for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> class unless there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection: Click, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 不会引发以下事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>类，除非没有至少一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合︰ 单击， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有至少一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>在集合中，以及用户与选项卡控件的标头进行交互 (其中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>名称显示)，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>引发相应的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果用户交互的选项卡页中，客户端区域内<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>引发相应的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示控件的客户端区域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The client area of a control is the bounds of the control, minus the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus.
trans-unit.target: 控件的客户端区域是该控件，减去如滚动条、 边框、 标题栏和菜单非工作区元素的边界。

trans-unit.source: Because client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the client area of the control, the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the rectangle returned by this property are (0,0).
trans-unit.target: 由于客户端坐标相对于控件的客户端区域的左上角，此属性返回的矩形的左上角的坐标为 (0，0)。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to obtain the size and coordinates of the client area of the control for tasks such as drawing on the surface of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于获取的大小和任务，例如在控件的图面上绘制的控件的客户端区域的坐标。

trans-unit.source: For more information about drawing on controls, see [Rendering a Windows Forms Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 在控件上绘制的详细信息，请参阅[呈现 Windows 窗体控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，表示控件的客户端区域。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height and width of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的高度和宽度的控件的工作区。

trans-unit.source: The client area of a control is the bounds of the control, minus the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus.
trans-unit.target: 控件的客户端区域是该控件，减去如滚动条、 边框、 标题栏和菜单非工作区元素的边界。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> method is called to set the ClientSizeproperty.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>方法调用来设置 ClientSizeproperty。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ClientSize property is not always changed through its `set` method so you should override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> method to ensure that your code is executed when the ClientSize property is set.
trans-unit.target: ClientSize 属性始终不更改通过其`set`方法，以便应重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>方法，以确保 ClientSize 属性设置时，执行你的代码。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties represent the width and height of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性表示的宽度和高度的控件的工作区。</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to obtain the size of the client area of the control for tasks such as drawing on the surface of the control.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此属性以获取有关任务，例如在控件的图面上绘制控件的客户端区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: For more information about drawing on controls, see [Rendering a Windows Forms Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 在控件上绘制的详细信息，请参阅[呈现 Windows 窗体控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You cannot bind application settings to this property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 无法将应用程序设置绑定到此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on application settings, see [Application Settings Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 应用程序设置的详细信息，请参阅[应用程序设置概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the dimensions of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> ，它表示控件的客户端区域的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the company or creator of the application containing the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含控件的应用程序的创建者的公司的名称。

trans-unit.source: The CompanyName property is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: CompanyName 属性是只读的属性。

trans-unit.source: To change the value of this property, set the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyCompanyAttribute.Company%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyCompanyAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改此属性的值，设置<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyCompanyAttribute.Company%2A>属性值的<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyCompanyAttribute>。</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyCompanyAttribute> </xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyCompanyAttribute.Company%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of C# code sets the CompanyName property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 C# 代码行将设置 CompanyName 属性。

trans-unit.source: ```c# [assembly: AssemblyCompany("Microsoft")] ``` > [!NOTE] > It is strongly recommended that you provide the company name, product name, and product version for your app.
trans-unit.target: ```c# [assembly: AssemblyCompany("Microsoft")] ``` > [!NOTE]1> 强烈建议为你的应用程序提供的公司名称、 产品名称和产品版本。

trans-unit.source: The company name or creator of the application containing the control.
trans-unit.target: 公司名称或包含该控件的应用程序的创建者。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value indicating whether the specified control is a child of the control.
trans-unit.target: 检索一个值，该值指定的控件是否控件的子级。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>评估。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified control is a child of the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的控件是子节点的控件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control, or one of its child controls, currently has the input focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示该控件，或一个子控件当前是否有输入的焦点。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a control or any of the controls contained within it has the input focus.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于确定控件或任何它所包含的控件是否具有输入的焦点。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the control has focus, regardless of whether any of its child controls have focus, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否在控件有焦点，而不考虑任何子控件是否有焦点，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focused%2A>

trans-unit.source: To give a control the input focus, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要为控件提供输入的焦点，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control or one of its child controls currently has the input focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件或它的一个子控件当前已经有输入的焦点，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与控件关联的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: Use a shortcut menus to give context-specific menu options to users when they right-click on the control.
trans-unit.target: 使用快捷菜单在向用户提供特定于上下文菜单选项，当它们在控件上右键单击时。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"></xref> that represents the shortcut menu associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"> </xref> ，表示与控件关联的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ContextMenu%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>与此控件关联。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> has also been assigned to the control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>具有已同时分配给该控件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>使其优先<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref>对于此控件，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有任何<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。
