trans-unit.target: 当从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>移除控件时发生

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of controls contained within the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含在控件内的控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> can act as a parent to a collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>可以充当控件的集合的父级。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: For example, when several controls are added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, each of the controls is a member of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> assigned to the Controls property of the form, which is derived from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当多个控件添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>每个控件是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>分配给窗体，后者从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>派生的控件属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>的成员，</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate the controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> assigned to the Controls property by using the methods available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以操作中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>分配给通过在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>中可用的方法的控件属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>的控件

trans-unit.source: When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method before initializing the controls to be added.
trans-unit.target: 在多个控件添加到父控件时，建议您调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>方法之前初始化要添加的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After adding the controls to the parent control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在将控件添加到父控件之后, 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Doing so will increase the performance of applications with many controls.
trans-unit.target: 这样会增加有许多控件的应用程序的性能。

trans-unit.source: Use the Controls property to iterate through all controls of a form, including nested controls.
trans-unit.target: 控件属性可用于循环访问所有控件的窗体中，包括嵌套的控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetNextControl%2A> method to retrieve the previous or next child control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetNextControl%2A>方法来检索上一页或下一页子控件的 tab 键顺序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetNextControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to get or set the active control of a container control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>属性来获取或设置容器控件的活动控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> representing the collection of controls contained within the control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>表示的控件内包含的控件的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的辅助功能对象，该控件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果不显式调用 CreateAccessibilityInstance 方法，它时将会调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>引用属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 要获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>属性，必须添加对引用`Accessibility`与安装程序集[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Forces the creation of the visible control, including the creation of the handle and any visible child controls.
trans-unit.target: 强制创建可见控件，包括创建句柄和任何可见子控件。

trans-unit.source: The CreateControl method forces a handle to be created for the control and its child controls.
trans-unit.target: CreateControl 方法强制要创建的控件及其子控件的句柄。

trans-unit.source: This method is used when you need a handle immediately for manipulation of the control or its children; simply calling a control's constructor does not create the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当需要一个句柄立即进行操作的控件或其子项; 使用此方法只需调用控件的构造函数不会创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: CreateControl does not create a control handle if the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: CreateControl 不会创建控件句柄，如果控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>属性是`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can either call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> method or access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> property to create the control's handle regardless of the control's visibility, but in this case, no window handles are created for the control's children.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A>方法或访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>要创建控件的属性处理而不考虑控件的可见性，但在此情况下，为控件的子级创建句柄没有窗口。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the control collection for the control.
trans-unit.target: 创建控件的控件集合的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: 新实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>分配给该控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has been created.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否已创建。

trans-unit.source: The Created property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> was successfully created even though the control's handle might not have been created or recreated yet.
trans-unit.target: 创建属性返回`true`如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>即使控件的句柄可能尚未创建或尚未重新创建已成功创建。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has been created; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已创建控件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that you retrieve through the CreateGraphics method should not normally be retained after the current Windows message has been processed, because anything painted with that object will be erased with the next WM_PAINT message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>通过 CreateGraphics 方法检索的对象应不通常会保留后当前的 Windows 消息已处理，因为与该对象的任何内容将与下一步 WM_PAINT 消息清除。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Therefore you cannot cache the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object for reuse, except to use non-visual methods like <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你不能缓存<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>以重用，除非若要使用非可视方法，如<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.MeasureString%2A?displayProperty=fullName>对象</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Instead, you must call CreateGraphics every time that you want to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, and then call <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using it.
trans-unit.target: 相反，您必须调用 CreateGraphics 每当你想要使用的<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象，，然后调用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A>在完成后使用它。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: For more information about Windows messages, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>

trans-unit.source: By design, CreateGraphics sets ownership to the calling thread, and fails if it is called on other threads.
trans-unit.target: 通过设计，CreateGraphics 将所有权设置为调用线程，并且如果在其他线程上调用将失败。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In addition to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, and CreateGraphics if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>属性，在控件上都是线程安全的四种方法︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>，和 CreateGraphics 如果已创建控件的句柄。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling CreateGraphics before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: 调用 CreateGraphics 在后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前，可能会导致跨线程调用的非法。

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有其他方法调用，你应使用 invoke 方法之一进行封送处理对控件的线程的调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle for the control.
trans-unit.target: 创建控件句柄。

trans-unit.source: You typically should not call the CreateHandle method directly.
trans-unit.target: 你通常不应 CreateHandle 方法直接调用。

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControl%2A> method, which forces a handle to be created for the control and its child controls when the control is created.
trans-unit.target: 首选的方法是调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControl%2A>方法，这会强制创建控件时，要创建的控件及其子控件的句柄。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object is in a disposed state.
trans-unit.target: 对象处于已释放的状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 创建控件句柄时，请获取需要的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: The CreateParams property should not be overridden and used to adjust the properties of your derived control.
trans-unit.target: CreateParams 属性不应重写，用于调整派生控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Properties such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should be set by the corresponding properties in your control such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>应该通过如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>控件中的相应属性将设置</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Height%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Width%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Caption%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> should only be extended when you are wrapping a standard Windows control class or to set styles not provided by the Windows Forms namespace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>包装标准 Windows 控件类或设置样式不是由 Windows 窗体命名空间时才应扩展。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the [CREATESTRUCT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632603.aspx)structure documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关创建控制参数的详细信息，请参阅`CreateWindow`和`CreateWindowEx`函数和[CREATESTRUCT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632603.aspx)结构文档。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> ，其中包含需要的创建参数时创建该控件的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cursor that is displayed when the mouse pointer is over the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置鼠标指针位于控件上方时显示的光标。

trans-unit.source: Assign a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor> to the Cursor property of the control to change the cursor displayed when the mouse pointer is over the control.
trans-unit.target: 分配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>控件更改鼠标指针位于控件上方时显示的光标的光标属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>

trans-unit.source: To temporarily change the mouse cursor for all controls on your application set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要暂时更改你的应用程序集上的所有控件的鼠标光标<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically you would set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to a wait cursor when populating a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> or saving or loading a file.
trans-unit.target: 通常将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性填充时等待光标<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>或保存或加载文件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Cursor property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: 游标属性是环境的属性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>都不具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>作为其父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>默认情况下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>类或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类概述。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> that represents the cursor to display when the mouse pointer is over the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"> </xref> ，表示当鼠标指针位于控件上方时要显示的光标。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data bindings for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataBindings property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用数据绑定属性来访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection>

trans-unit.source: By adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> objects to the collection, you can bind any property of a control to the property of an object.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>对象添加到集合中，你可以将控件的任何属性绑定到对象的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> objects for the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlBindingsCollection"> </xref>包含<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref>控件的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认背景色。

trans-unit.source: This is the default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property value of a generic top-level control.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>的通用的顶级控件的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can have different defaults.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类可以有不同的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The default background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 默认背景<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>的控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cursor for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的默认光标。

trans-unit.source: Override DefaultCursor to configure a default cursor for your control.
trans-unit.target: 重写缺省游标来配置您的控件的默认光标。

trans-unit.source: This is more efficient than setting the cursor in the control's constructor, and gives automatic support for certain cursor-related designer functions.
trans-unit.target: 这比将光标设置在控件的构造函数中更高效，并为自动支持提供某些游标相关的设计器函数。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> representing the current default cursor.
trans-unit.target: 类型的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref>表示当前默认光标。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default font of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认字体。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the value returned by DefaultFont depending on the operating system and local culture.
trans-unit.target: 下表介绍 DefaultFont 取决于操作系统和本地区域性返回的值。

trans-unit.source: |System/and or Culture|Font| |----------------------------|----------| |Windows NT 4x, Japanese version|MS UI Gothic, 9 point.| |Arabic Windows|Tahoma, 8 point.| |Other operating system/culture|MS Shell Dlg logical font, typically Microsoft San Serif 8 point.| MS Shell Dlg maps to a font set in the system registry.
trans-unit.target: |系统 / 和或区域性 |字体 | |----------------------------|----------| |X，日语版本的 Windows NT 4 | MS UI 歌特，9 点。 | |Arabic Windows |Tahoma，8 磅。 | |其他操作系统/区域性 | MS Shell Dlg 逻辑字体，通常 Microsoft San Serif 8 点。 | MS Shell Dlg 将映射到在系统注册表中设置的字体。

trans-unit.source: If the previous fonts are not installed, the default font is Tahoma, 8 point.
trans-unit.target: 如果未安装以前的字体，默认字体是宋体，8 磅。

trans-unit.source: If Tahoma, 8 point, is not installed, DefaultFontreturns the value of the <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily.GenericSansSerif%2A> property
trans-unit.target: 如果 Tahoma，8 点，未安装，DefaultFontreturns<xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily.GenericSansSerif%2A>属性</xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily.GenericSansSerif%2A>的值

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>的控件。

trans-unit.source: The value returned will vary depending on the user's operating system the local culture setting of their system.
trans-unit.target: 其系统的本地区域性设置，返回值将有所不同具体取决于用户的操作系统。

trans-unit.source: The default font or the regional alternative fonts are not installed on the client computer.
trans-unit.target: 在客户端计算机上未安装默认字体或区域的备用字体。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认前景色。

trans-unit.source: This is the default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property value of a nonparented control.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>无父级控件的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can have different defaults.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类可以有不同的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The default foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 默认前景色<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>的控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ControlText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ControlText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件支持的默认输入法编辑器 (IME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: An Input Method Editor (IME) is a program that enables users to enter complex characters and symbols, such as Japanese Kanji characters, by using a standard keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 输入法编辑器 (IME) 是使用户能够通过使用标准键盘输入复杂字符和符号，如日语汉字字符的程序。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class, this property always returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: 在中实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类，此属性始终返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> value specifies that the IME mode is inherited from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>值指定的 IME 模式从父控件继承。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件之间默认指定的空间，以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the default space between controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>表示控件之间默认间距。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length and height, in pixels, that is specified as the default maximum size of a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取长度和高度，以像素为单位，指定为控件的默认最大大小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> representing the size of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A>表示控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length and height, in pixels, that is specified as the default minimum size of a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取长度和高度，以像素为单位，指定为控件的默认最小大小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the size of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>表示控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取以像素为单位，控件的内容的内部间距。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the internal spacing of the contents of a control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>表示控件内容内部间距。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: The DefaultSize property represents the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of the control when it is initially created.
trans-unit.target: DefaultSize 属性表示<xref:System.Drawing.Size>最初创建时的控件。</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: You can adjust the size of the control by setting its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置调整控件大小其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To maintain better performance, do not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 为了保持更好的性能，不要设置<xref:System.Drawing.Size>处于其构造函数的控件。</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to override the DefaultSize property.
trans-unit.target: 首选的方法是重写 DefaultSize 属性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> Windows Server 2003 上系统、 大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>受到的最大像素宽度和高度的监视器。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>的控件。

trans-unit.source: Sends the specified message to the default window procedure.
trans-unit.target: 向默认窗口过程发送指定的消息。

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the [WindowProc function](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅[WindowProc 函数](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565)。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>到进程。

trans-unit.source: Destroys the handle associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 毁坏与该控件关联的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示控件的显示区域的矩形。

trans-unit.source: The DisplayRectangle property returns the client rectangle of the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: DisplayRectangle 属性返回控件的显示区域的客户端的矩形。

trans-unit.source: For the base control class, this is equal to the client rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 对于基控件类中，这是与客户端矩形相等。

trans-unit.source: However, inheriting controls might want to change this if their client area differs from their display area.
trans-unit.target: 但是，继承控件可能想要更改此如果其客户端区域与其显示区域不同。

trans-unit.source: The display rectangle is the smallest <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> that encloses a control and is used to lay out controls.
trans-unit.target: 显示矩形是最小<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>，包括控件，使用控件进行布局。</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，表示控件的显示区域。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and its child controls and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>和及其子控件，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.`Dispose()`
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。`Dispose()` </xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing`parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数是`true`，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>引用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose()`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> class is in the process of disposing.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否基<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>类是在释放进程中。

trans-unit.source: When this property returns `true`, the base<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class is in the process of disposing.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性返回`true`，基<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类是在释放进程中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: After the control is disposed of, it can no longer be referenced as a valid Windows control.
trans-unit.target: 控件释放后，不再有效的 Windows 控件作为引用。

trans-unit.source: Even though the instance of a control is disposed of, it is still maintained in memory until it is removed from memory through garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 即使控件的实例已释放，它仍保留在内存中直到从通过垃圾回收的内存中删除。

trans-unit.source: When a control is disposed of, you cannot call its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 当控件被释放的时不能调用其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the base <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> class is in the process of disposing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果基<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>类正在释放; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which control borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a control is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置哪些控件边框停靠到其父控件并确定如何随其父级调整控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: Use the Dock property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Dock 属性用于定义如何调整控件的自动调整其父控件的大小时。

trans-unit.source: For example, setting Dock to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName> causes the control to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 例如，设置为停靠<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName>导致的控件将其自身的其父控件的左边缘对齐，并根据父控件一起调整大小调整大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth).
trans-unit.target: 控件停靠在其 Z 顺序，即沿窗体的 z 轴 （深度） 窗体上控件的可视化分层。

trans-unit.source: A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以停靠到其父容器的一个边或可以停靠到所有边缘和填充的父容器。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A> property on a docked control has no effect on the distance of the control from the the edges of its container.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>停靠控件上的属性具有不从控件的距离会影响其容器的边缘。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Margin%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> and Dock properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>而停靠属性都是相互排斥。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个可以设置一次和最后一个组将优先。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Begins a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 开始拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: The `allowedEffects` parameter determines which drag operations can occur.
trans-unit.target: `allowedEffects`参数确定哪些拖动操作可以发生。

trans-unit.source: If the drag operation needs to interoperate with applications in another process, data should either be a base managed class (<xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, or <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>), or an object that implements <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 如果在拖动操作需要与另一个进程中的应用程序进行互操作，数据应为基的托管的类 (<xref:System.String>， <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>，或<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile>)，或对象，以便实现<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> </xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 下面介绍如何以及何时引发与拖放操作相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The DoDragDrop method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: DoDragDrop 方法可确定当前光标位置下的控件。

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 然后检查以确定控件是否有效的放置目标。

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件是有效的放置目标，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>产生指定的拖放效果引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关拖放效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: 中的鼠标光标位置、 键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改进行跟踪。

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果用户移出一个窗口，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标进入另一个控件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>引发该控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘或鼠标按钮中更改状态，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据或取消该操作基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>事件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Continue`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>引发事件以继续操作和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>产生新效果引发事件，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>事件成对发生，以便用户当鼠标移到放置目标时，提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Drop`、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Cancel`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DoDragDrop method catches all exceptions and rethrows only the following security or critical exceptions: - SecurityException - NullReferenceException - StackOverflowException - OutOfMemoryException - ThreadAbortException - ExecutionEngineException - IndexOutOfRangeException - AccessViolationException
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> DoDragDrop 方法捕获所有异常，并重新引发的以下安全或严重异常:-SecurityException-NullReferenceException-StackOverflowException-OutOfMemoryException-ThreadAbortException-ExecutionEngineException-IndexOutOfRangeException-AccessViolationException

trans-unit.source: The data to drag.
trans-unit.target: 要拖动的数据。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: A value from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects"></xref> enumeration that represents the final effect that was performed during the drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 取值范围为<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects"></xref>表示拖放操作期间执行的最终效果的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer to reduce or prevent flicker.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此控件是否应重绘其图面，使用次要缓冲区以减少或避免闪烁。

trans-unit.source: Buffered graphics can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by progressive redrawing of parts of a displayed surface.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲的图形可以减少或消除引起的部件的显示的图面渐进式重绘的闪烁。

trans-unit.source: Buffered graphics require that the updated graphics data is first written to a buffer.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲的图形需要更新的图形数据首先写入缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The data in the graphics buffer is then quickly written to displayed surface memory.
trans-unit.target: 图形缓冲区中的数据快速然后写入到显示的图面内存中。

trans-unit.source: The relatively quick switch of the displayed graphics memory typically reduces the flicker that can otherwise occur.
trans-unit.target: 显示的图形内存相对快速交换机通常会减少可以出现闪烁。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > DoubleBuffered is not a bindable property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> DoubleBuffered 不是可绑定属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the surface of the control should be drawn using double buffering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应使用双缓冲; 绘制控件的图面否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 双击控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以设置单击鼠标按钮它认为是双击而不是两次单击之间的时间。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event is raised every time a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>每次双击控件时引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> and DoubleClick events of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> and DoubleClick events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>和 DoubleClick 事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>并双击窗体，这两种方法调用时引发了 DoubleClick 事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the DoubleClick event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event might be raised twice.
trans-unit.target: 如果双击控件时，该控件不支持的 DoubleClick 事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件，可能会引发两次。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: You must set the `StandardDoubleClick` and `StandardClick` values of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> to `true` for this event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置`StandardDoubleClick`和`StandardClick`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>到`true`会引发此事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: These values might already be set to `true` if you are inheriting from existing Windows Forms controls.
trans-unit.target: 这些值可能已设置为`true`如果从现有继承 Windows 窗体控件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The following events are not raised for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> class unless there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>, DoubleClick, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 不会引发以下事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>类，除非没有至少一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>、 DoubleClick <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有至少一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>在集合中，以及用户与选项卡控件的标头进行交互 (其中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>名称显示)，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>引发相应的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果用户交互的选项卡页中，客户端区域内<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>引发相应的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 拖放操作完成时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>位于屏幕坐标，未工作区坐标。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] code converts the properties to a client <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 以下行[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]代码将属性转换为客户端<xref:System.Drawing.Point>.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` > [!NOTE] > In versions earlier than [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], if you put a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> and DragDrop events on a Windows Form and drag and drop something onto the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> at design time, the `DropDrop` and `DropEnter` events are raised.
trans-unit.target: ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` > [!NOTE]1> 在版本早于[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，如果将放<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>和拖放 Windows 窗体上的事件和拖动某个对象拖到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>在设计时，`DropDrop`和`DropEnter`引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>

trans-unit.source: However, when you close and reopen the solution, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> and DragDrop events are not raised again.
trans-unit.target: 但是，当你关闭并重新打开该解决方案，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>和拖放事件不会再次引发。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 将对象拖入控件的边界时发生。

trans-unit.source: The DragEnter event is raised when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the control during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在拖放操作过程中首次将鼠标光标拖到控件时，将引发 DragEnter 事件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In versions earlier than [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], if you put a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> with DragEnter and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> events on a Windows Form and drag and drop something onto the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> at design time, the `DropDrop` and `DropEnter` events are raised.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 在版本早于[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，如果将放<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>与 DragEnter 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>Windows 窗体上的事件和拖动某个对象拖到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>在设计时，`DropDrop`和`DropEnter`引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>

trans-unit.source: However, when you close and reopen the solution, the DragEnter and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> events are not raised again.
trans-unit.target: 但是，当你关闭并重新打开该解决方案，DragEnter 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>不会再次引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>

trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Drop`、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Cancel`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>位于屏幕坐标，未工作区坐标。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] code converts the properties to a client <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 以下行[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]代码将属性转换为客户端<xref:System.Drawing.Point>.</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ```有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged out of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 将对象拖出控件的边界时发生。

trans-unit.source: The DragLeave event is raised when the user drags the cursor out of the control or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将拖出控件的光标或用户取消当前的拖放操作时，将引发 DragLeave 事件。

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 下面介绍如何以及何时引发与拖放操作相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>方法确定当前光标位置下的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 然后检查以确定控件是否有效的放置目标。

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件是有效的放置目标，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>产生指定的拖放效果引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关拖放效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: 中的鼠标光标位置、 键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改进行跟踪。

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the DragLeave event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果用户移出一个窗口，将引发 DragLeave 事件。

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标进入另一个控件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>引发该控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘或鼠标按钮中更改状态，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据或取消该操作基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>事件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Continue`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>引发事件以继续操作和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>产生新效果引发事件，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>事件成对发生，以便用户当鼠标移到放置目标时，提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Drop`、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the DragLeave event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Cancel`，将引发 DragLeave 事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object is dragged over the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 将对象拖到控件的边界时发生。

trans-unit.source: The DragOver event is raised when the mouse cursor moves within the bounds of the control during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标光标拖放操作期间的控件的边界内移动时，将引发拖动事件。

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 下面介绍如何以及何时引发与拖放操作相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>方法确定当前光标位置下的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 然后检查以确定控件是否有效的放置目标。

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件是有效的放置目标，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>产生指定的拖放效果引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关拖放效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: 中的鼠标光标位置、 键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改进行跟踪。

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果用户移出一个窗口，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标进入另一个控件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>引发该控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the DragOver event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件中，将引发拖动事件。

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘或鼠标按钮中更改状态，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据或取消该操作基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>事件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> value is `Continue`, the DragOver event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>值是`Continue`，将引发拖动事件继续执行操作和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>产生新效果引发事件，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DragOver and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 拖动和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>事件成对发生，以便用户当鼠标移到放置目标时，提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Drop`、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Cancel`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>位于屏幕坐标，未工作区坐标。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of C# code converts the properties to a client <xref:System.Drawing.Point>: > > Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: C# 代码会将向客户端<xref:System.Drawing.Point>属性的以下行: >> 点 clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient （新的点 (de。X，de。Y)); 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Supports rendering to the specified bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 支持对指定位图的呈现。

trans-unit.source: The DrawToBitmap method is not supported for ActiveX controls.
trans-unit.target: ActiveX 控件不支持 DrawToBitmap 方法。

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A> event and provide custom printing logic if required.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>事件，并提供自定义打印逻辑，如果需要。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DrawToBitmap method has the following limitations: - An <xref:System.ArgumentException> might be thrown for large bitmaps.
trans-unit.target: DrawToBitmap 方法具有以下限制:-一个<xref:System.ArgumentException>针对大型位图，可能会引发。</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The maximum allowable size varies by machine.
trans-unit.target: 因计算机而异的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: - DrawToBitmap does not support the `Ink` controls for the Windows XP Tablet PC Edition 2005 operating system.
trans-unit.target: -DrawToBitmap 不支持`Ink`Windows XP Tablet PC Edition 2005 操作系统的控件。

trans-unit.source: - DrawToBitmap does not draw a child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: -DrawToBitmap 不绘制子<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: - Controls inside containers are rendered in reverse order.
trans-unit.target: 的在容器内控件呈现按相反的顺序。

trans-unit.source: - DrawToBitmap is not fully functional for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>; only the border of a bitmap is drawn.
trans-unit.target: -DrawToBitmap 不是完全正常工作，以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>; 仅绘制的位图的边框。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The bitmap to be drawn to.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制到的位图。

trans-unit.source: The bounds within which the control is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 时呈现控件边界。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control can respond to user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否可以对用户交互作出响应。

trans-unit.source: With the Enabled property, you can enable or disable controls at run time.
trans-unit.target: 使用的 Enabled 属性中，可以启用或禁用在运行时的控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can disable controls that do not apply to the current state of the application.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以禁用不适用于应用程序的当前状态的控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also disable a control to restrict its use.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以禁用以限制其使用的控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, a button can be disabled to prevent the user from clicking it.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以禁用按钮，以防止用户单击它。

trans-unit.source: If a control is disabled, it cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用了控件，则无法选择。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Setting the Enabled property to `false` does not disable the application's control box or prevent the application window from receiving the focus.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 将的 Enabled 属性设置为`false`不会禁用应用程序的控制框或防止应用程序窗口接收焦点。

trans-unit.source: When a container control has its enabled property set to `false`, all its contained controls are disabled, as well.
trans-unit.target: 当容器控件具有设置为其启用的属性`false`，其包含的所有控件将被都禁用，以及。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user clicks on any of the controls contained in a disabled <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control, no events are raised.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果用户单击的任何控件中已禁用包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>控件，会引发任何事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a scrollable control is disabled, the scroll bars are also disabled.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时禁用可滚动控件，则还将禁用滚动条。

trans-unit.source: For example, a disabled multiline textbox is unable to scroll to display all the lines of text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，已禁用的多行文本框中不能进行滚动才能显示的文本的所有行。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control can respond to user interaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件可以响应用户交互;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*>属性值已更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the return value of the asynchronous operation represented by the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> passed.
trans-unit.target: 检索所表示的异步操作的返回值<xref:System.IAsyncResult>传递。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: If the asynchronous operation has not been completed, this function will block until the result is available.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未完成异步操作，在结果可用之前，将阻止此函数。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In addition to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, EndInvoke, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>属性，在控件上都是线程安全的四种方法︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>，EndInvoke，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>是否已创建控件句柄。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>在后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致跨线程调用的非法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有其他方法调用，你应使用 invoke 方法之一进行封送处理对控件的线程的调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> that represents a specific invoke asynchronous operation, returned when calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>表示一个特定的调用返回时调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke*>的异步操作的</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> generated by the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>由异步操作生成。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The asyncResult parameter value is .
trans-unit.target: The asyncResult parameter value is .

trans-unit.source: The asyncResult object was not created by a preceding call of the method from the same control.
trans-unit.target: asyncResult 对象不由前一个调用从同一个控件中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is entered.
trans-unit.target: 进入控件时发生。
