trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the form that the control is on.
trans-unit.target: 检索控件上的窗体。

trans-unit.source: The control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> property value might not be the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> returned by FindForm method.
trans-unit.target: 控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>属性值可能不与相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>FindForm 方法返回。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control is contained within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> is on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控件包含中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>控制，以及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form><xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>以及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> 、</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>是</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that the control is on.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref>上的控件。

trans-unit.source: Sets input focus to the control.
trans-unit.target: 设置输入焦点移到控件。

trans-unit.source: The Focus method returns `true` if the control successfully received input focus.
trans-unit.target: 焦点方法返回`true`如果控件成功接收输入的焦点。

trans-unit.source: The control can have the input focus while not displaying any visual cues of having the focus.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以在不显示有焦点的任何视觉提示时具有输入的焦点。

trans-unit.source: This behavior is primarily observed by the nonselectable controls listed below, or any controls derived from them.
trans-unit.target: 下面列出的不可选择控件主要遵循此行为，或任何控件派生自它们。

trans-unit.source: A control can be selected and receive input focus if all the following are true: the `Selectable` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以选中并接收输入的焦点，如果符合下列所有条件︰`Selectable`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>设置为`true`，该列包含在另一个控件中，并且所有其父控件是否可见且已启用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表中的 Windows 窗体控件不是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from these controls are also not selectable.
trans-unit.target: 派生自这些控件的控件也是不可选的。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control) > [!NOTE] > Focus is a low-level method intended primarily for custom control authors.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>（时不存在控件中的链接）&1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 焦点是低级别的方法主要适用于自定义控件作者。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Instead, application programmers should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property for child controls, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A> method for forms.
trans-unit.target: 相反，应使用应用程序程序员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>子控件的属性或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A>窗体的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Activate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the input focus request was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果输入的焦点请求成功，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has input focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否有输入焦点。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件有焦点，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件显示的文本的字体。

trans-unit.source: The Font property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: 字体属性是一个环境属性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>都不具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>作为其父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>默认情况下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>类或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类概述。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the Font property a new <xref:System.Drawing.Font>.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Drawing.Font>不可变 （这意味着你无法调整其任何属性），你可以仅字体将属性分配新<xref:System.Drawing.Font>。</xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: However, you can base the new font on the existing font.
trans-unit.target: 但是，您可以基于新的字体基于现有的字体。

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#] The following is an example of how to adjust the existing font to make it bold: ```c# myControl.Font = new Font(myControl.Font, myControl.Font.Style | FontStyle.Bold); ``` ```vb# MyControl.Font = New Font(MyControl.Font, _ MyControl.Font.Style Or FontStyle.Bold) ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic、 C#] 下面是如何调整现有字体以使其成为粗体的示例︰```c# myControl.Font = new Font(myControl.Font, myControl.Font.Style | FontStyle.Bold); ``` ```vb# MyControl.Font = New Font(MyControl.Font, _ MyControl.Font.Style Or FontStyle.Bold) ```

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>要应用于由控件显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*>属性值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>通过以编程方式修改或通过交互更改属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的字体的高度。

trans-unit.target: 高度<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>以像素为单位的控件。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: The ForeColor property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: 前景色属性是环境的属性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。

trans-unit.target: 前台<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>的控件。

trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*>属性值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the control that contains the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: 检索包含指定句柄的控件。

trans-unit.source: This method searches up the window handle parent chain until it finds a handle that is associated with a control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法搜索窗口句柄父链向上，直至找到与控件关联的句柄。

trans-unit.source: This method is more reliable than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromHandle%2A> method, because it correctly returns controls that own more than one handle.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是比更可靠<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromHandle%2A>方法，因为它正确返回拥有多个句柄的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The window handle (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) to search for.
trans-unit.target: 窗口句柄 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) 搜索。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the control associated with the specified handle; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no control with the specified handle is found.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> ，表示与指定句柄关联的控件; 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找到与指定句柄没有控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the control that is currently associated with the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前与指定句柄关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromChildHandle%2A> method if you need to return controls that own more than one handle.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromChildHandle%2A>方法如果你需要返回拥有多个句柄的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FromChildHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The window handle (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) to search for.
trans-unit.target: 窗口句柄 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) 搜索。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the control associated with the specified handle; returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no control with the specified handle is found.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> ，表示与指定句柄关联的控件; 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找到与指定句柄没有控件。

trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value indicating how a control will behave when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*> property is enabled.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the child control that is located at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 检索位于指定坐标处的子控件。

trans-unit.source: If there is no child control at the specified point, the GetChildAtPoint method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果将不存在子控件指定点处，GetChildAtPoint 方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates where you want to look for a control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，包含你想要查找控件的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Coordinates are expressed relative to the upper-left corner of the control's client area.
trans-unit.target: 坐标相对于控件的客户端区域的左上角来表示。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the control that is located at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> ，表示位于指定点处的控件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the child control that is located at the specified coordinates, specifying whether to ignore child controls of a certain type.
trans-unit.target: 检索位于指定坐标，指定是否忽略特定类型的子控件的子控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates where you want to look for a control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，包含你想要查找控件的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Coordinates are expressed relative to the upper-left corner of the control's client area.
trans-unit.target: 坐标相对于控件的客户端区域的左上角来表示。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GetChildAtPointSkip"></xref>, determining whether to ignore child controls of a certain type.
trans-unit.target: 值之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GetChildAtPointSkip"> </xref>，确定是否忽略特定类型的子控件。

trans-unit.source: The child <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 子<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>指定坐标处。

trans-unit.source: Returns the next <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl"></xref> up the control's chain of parent controls.
trans-unit.target: 返回下一个<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl"></xref>沿着控件的父控件链向上。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl"></xref>, that represents the parent of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl"> </xref>，表示的父<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the next control forward or back in the tab order of child controls.
trans-unit.target: 子控件的 tab 键顺序向前或向后检索下一个控件。

trans-unit.source: The GetNextControl method is dependent on tab order.
trans-unit.target: GetNextControl 方法均依赖于 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: To iterate through all controls of a form, including nested controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要循环访问所有控件的窗体中，包括嵌套的控件，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get or set the active control of a container control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取或设置容器控件的活动控件，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to start the search with.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>若要开始搜索。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to search forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to search backward.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>tab 键顺序中; 向前搜索<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>向后搜索。

trans-unit.source: The next <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 下一步<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>的 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: 检索适合控件的矩形区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of GetPreferredSize differs by control.
trans-unit.target: GetPreferredSize 的行为不同的控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine%2A> might be unable to assign the returned size to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine%2A>可能导致无法将返回的大小分配给控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can return a size larger than the constraints indicated in the `proposedSize` parameter, but `proposedSize` should decrease as the constraint decreases.
trans-unit.target: 你可以返回大小大于所示的约束`proposedSize`参数，但`proposedSize`会降低随着约束的降低。

trans-unit.source: For example, `GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))` should not be wider than `GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))`不应为宽于`GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`。

trans-unit.source: The exception is a `proposedSize` of 0 or `Size.Empty`, which are defined as unconstrained.
trans-unit.target: 例外情况是`proposedSize`为 0 或`Size.Empty`，其定义为不受约束。

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: 控件自定义大小的区域。

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 类型的有序的对<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>表示的宽度和高度的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: 检索缩放控件时的边界。

trans-unit.source: This is a helper method that is called by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> to retrieve the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: 这是由调用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>检索缩放控件时的边界。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to reuse the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> scaling logic, but you must supply your own bounds.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重写此方法以重用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>缩放逻辑，但你必须提供您自己的边界。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns scaled bounds that take into account the `specified` bounds, whether the control is top level, whether the control is fixed width or auto size, and any adornments the control might have.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现返回考虑采取的缩放的边界`specified`边界，是否控件为顶级，是否控件为固定宽度或自动调整大小，以及任何控件可能具有的修饰。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area for which to retrieve the display bounds.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>指定为其检索在显示器边界的区域。

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 高度和宽度的控件的边界。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: 值之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> ，指定要定义其大小和位置时使用的控件边界。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示在其中缩放控件的边界。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value of the specified control style bit for the control.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定的控件样式位控件的值。

trans-unit.source: Control style bit flags are used to categorize supported behavior.
trans-unit.target: 控件样式位标志可用于进行分类支持的行为。

trans-unit.source: A control can enable a style by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method and passing in the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit and the Boolean value to set the bit to.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以启用一种样式，通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>方法并传入适当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>位，要将位设置为的布尔值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the value assigned to a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit, use the GetStyle method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> member to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定分配给指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>位、 使用 GetStyle 方法并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>成员来计算。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"></xref> bit to return the value from.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"> </xref>位要返回的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified control style bit is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的控件样式位设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the control is a top-level control.
trans-unit.target: 确定控件是否为顶级控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is a top-level control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件为顶级控件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 在拖动操作期间发生。

trans-unit.source: The GiveFeedback event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: 拖放操作开始时，将引发 GiveFeedback 事件。

trans-unit.source: With the GiveFeedback event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 与 GiveFeedback 事件中，拖动事件的源可以修改鼠标指针的外观，以便在拖放操作过程中为提供的用户的可视反馈。

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 下面介绍如何以及何时引发与拖放操作相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>方法确定当前光标位置下的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 然后检查以确定控件是否有效的放置目标。

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the GiveFeedback event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件是有效的放置目标，GiveFeedback 事件引发指定的拖放效果。

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关拖放效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: 中的鼠标光标位置、 键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改进行跟踪。

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果用户移出一个窗口，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标进入另一个控件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>引发该控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘或鼠标按钮中更改状态，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据或取消该操作基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>事件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the GiveFeedback event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Continue`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>引发事件以继续操作并 GiveFeedback 事件引发产生新效果，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and GiveFeedback events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>和 GiveFeedback 事件成对发生，以便用户当鼠标移到放置目标时，提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Drop`、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Cancel`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 在控件接收焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the window handle that the control is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 获取该控件绑定到的窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Handle property is a Windows `HWND`.
trans-unit.target: 句柄属性的值是一个 Windows `HWND`。

trans-unit.source: If the handle has not yet been created, referencing this property will force the handle to be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未创建句柄，则引用此属性将强制要创建的句柄。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> that contains the window handle (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IntPtr>包含的窗口句柄 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_HWND" name="HWND" href=""></xref>) 的控件。</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a handle is created for the control.
trans-unit.target: 为控件创建句柄时发生。

trans-unit.source: A handle is created when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is displayed for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 当创建句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>首次显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is created that has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> set to `false`, the HandleCreated event will not be raised until <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>则会创建一个具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>设置为`false`，HandleCreated 事件不会引发直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see[Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control's handle is in the process of being destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 控件的句柄处于销毁时发生。

trans-unit.source: During the HandleDestroyed event, the control is still a valid Windows control and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> can be recreated by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在 HandleDestroyed 事件，该控件仍是有效的 Windows 控件和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>可以通过调用重新创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control contains one or more child controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否包含一个或多个子控件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection.Count%2A> greater than zero, the HasChildren property will return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>集合具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection.Count%2A>大于零，属性将返回 HasChildren `true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Layout.ArrangedElementCollection.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: Accessing the HasChildren property does not force the creation of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection> if the control has no children, so referencing this property can provide a performance benefit when walking a tree of controls.
trans-unit.target: 访问 HasChildren 属性不会强制创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>如果该控件没有任何子级，因此引用此属性可以提供性能益处时遍历树的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control contains one or more child controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件包含一个或多个子控件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的高度。

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the Height and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> property values cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> property value of the control to change.
trans-unit.target: 为高度的所做的更改和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>属性值将导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A>要更改的控件的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The minimum height for the derived control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 派生的控件的最小高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>为一个像素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: The default height for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control is three pixels.
trans-unit.target: 默认高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件为三个像素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: Setting the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control to a value less than one will reset the property value to the default height.
trans-unit.target: 设置的高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控制转移到一个值小于一个将属性值重置为默认高度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: The height of the control in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位控件的高度。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user requests help for a control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户请求控件帮助时发生。

trans-unit.source: The HelpRequested event is commonly raised when the user presses the F1 key or an associated context-sensitive help button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 当用户按下 F1 键或关联的上下文相关帮助按钮通常引发事件 HelpRequested 单击。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Conceals the control from the user.
trans-unit.target: 对用户隐藏控件。

trans-unit.source: Hiding the control is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏控件等效于设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the Hide method is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property returns a value of `false` until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Hide 方法调用后，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>属性返回的值`false`直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的输入法编辑器 (IME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: An IME is a program that enables users to enter complex characters and symbols, such as Japanese Kanji characters, using a standard keyboard.
trans-unit.target: IME 是一个程序，使用户能够输入复杂字符和符号，如日语汉字字符使用标准键盘。

trans-unit.source: The ImeMode property is typically set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control that is intended to only enter numeric values.
trans-unit.target: ImeMode 属性通常设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>旨在只需输入数字值的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ImeMode property value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class.
trans-unit.target: ImeMode 属性值设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Most classes that do not directly support Input Method Editors, or allow direct input from an IME, will set the value of this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>.
trans-unit.target: 不直接支持输入法编辑器，或允许从 IME 直接输入的大多数类将设置到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>此属性的值

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The user can interactively change the ImeMode unless it has been programmatically set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 用户以交互方式可以更改 ImeMode，除非已到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=fullName>以编程方式设置

trans-unit.source: In this case, the user will not be able to use the IME.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，用户将不能使用 IME。

trans-unit.source: > > The ImeMode property is ignored on Windows 8 when the global input mode is in effect.
trans-unit.target: >> 实际上全局输入的模式时，将在 Windows 8 上忽略 ImeMode 属性。

trans-unit.source: For more info, see[Switch Text Input Changed from Per-Thread to Per-User](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=256509).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[交换机文本输入从更改每个线程为每个用户](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=256509)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 所赋的值不是之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the IME mode of a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的 IME 模式。

trans-unit.source: The IME mode of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的 IME 模式。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>属性已更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode%2A>通过以编程方式修改或通过交互更改属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ImeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls that do not support Input Method Managers will never raise this event.
trans-unit.target: 不支持输入法管理器控件将永远不会引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Called after the control has been added to another container.
trans-unit.target: 在控件已添加到另一个容器之后调用。

trans-unit.source: The InitLayout method is called immediately after adding a control to a container.
trans-unit.target: 将控件添加到容器后立即调用 InitLayout 方法。

trans-unit.source: The InitLayout method enables a control to initialize its layout state based on its container.
trans-unit.target: InitLayout 方法使控件能够将基于其容器其布局状态初始化。

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically apply anchoring and docking to the control in the InitLayout method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你通常会应用锚定和停靠到 InitLayout 方法中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the entire surface of the control and causes the control to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 使控件的整个图面无效并重绘控件。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method does not force a synchronous paint; to force a synchronous paint, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A> method after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>方法不会强制同步绘制; 若要强制同步绘制，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A>方法之后调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called with no parameters, the entire client area is added to the update region.
trans-unit.target: 当不带任何参数调用此方法时，整个工作区添加到更新区域。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates a specific region of the control and causes a paint message to be sent to the control.
trans-unit.target: 使控件的特定区域无效并导致向控件发送绘制消息。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, invalidates the child controls assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: （可选），使分配给控件的子控件无效。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method does not force a synchronous paint; to force a synchronous paint, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A> method after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>方法不会强制同步绘制; 若要强制同步绘制，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A>方法之后调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called with no parameters, the entire client area is added to the update region.
trans-unit.target: 当不带任何参数调用此方法时，整个工作区添加到更新区域。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to invalidate the control's child controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使控件的子控件; 无效否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified region of the control (adds it to the control's update region, which is the area that will be repainted at the next paint operation), and causes a paint message to be sent to the control.
trans-unit.target: 使控件 （将其添加到控件的更新区域，下次绘制操作将重新绘制的区域），指定的区域无效并导致向控件发送绘制消息。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method does not force a synchronous paint; to force a synchronous paint, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A> method after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>方法不会强制同步绘制; 若要强制同步绘制，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A>方法之后调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called with no parameters, the entire client area is added to the update region.
trans-unit.target: 当不带任何参数调用此方法时，整个工作区添加到更新区域。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the region to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，表示要使之无效的区域。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified region of the control (adds it to the control's update region, which is the area that will be repainted at the next paint operation), and causes a paint message to be sent to the control.
trans-unit.target: 使控件 （将其添加到控件的更新区域，下次绘制操作将重新绘制的区域），指定的区域无效并导致向控件发送绘制消息。

trans-unit.source: Calling the Invalidate method does not force a synchronous paint; to force a synchronous paint, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A> method after calling the Invalidate method.
trans-unit.target: 调用 Invalidate 方法不会强制同步的绘制;若要强制同步绘制，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A>方法之后调用 Invalidate 方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called with no parameters, the entire client area is added to the update region.
trans-unit.target: 当不带任何参数调用此方法时，整个工作区添加到更新区域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>要使其无效。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified region of the control (adds it to the control's update region, which is the area that will be repainted at the next paint operation), and causes a paint message to be sent to the control.
trans-unit.target: 使控件 （将其添加到控件的更新区域，下次绘制操作将重新绘制的区域），指定的区域无效并导致向控件发送绘制消息。

trans-unit.target: 当不带任何参数调用此方法时，整个工作区添加到更新区域。

trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>方法不会强制同步绘制; 若要强制同步绘制，调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A>方法之后调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Update%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidate%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"> </xref>要使其无效。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使控件的子控件; 无效否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control's display requires redrawing.
trans-unit.target: 控件的显示要求重新绘制时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle.
trans-unit.target: 在拥有控件的基础窗口句柄的线程上执行指定的委托。

trans-unit.source: Delegates are similar to function pointers in C or C++ languages.
trans-unit.target: 委托是类似于 C 或 c + + 语言中的函数指针。

trans-unit.source: Delegates encapsulate a reference to a method inside a delegate object.
trans-unit.target: 委托封装对委托对象中的方法的引用。

trans-unit.source: The delegate object can then be passed to code that calls the referenced method, and the method to be invoked can be unknown at compile time.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以传递给调用所引用的方法的代码的委托对象和要调用的方法可以在编译时未知。

trans-unit.source: Unlike function pointers in C or C++, delegates are object-oriented, type-safe, and more secure.
trans-unit.target: 与在 C 或 c + + 中的函数指针，不同委托是面向对象的、 类型安全和更安全。

trans-unit.source: The Invoke method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that has a window handle if the current control's underlying window handle does not exist yet.
trans-unit.target: Invoke 方法搜索化控件的父链，直到它找到的控件或窗体中有的窗口句柄，如果当前控件的基础窗口句柄尚不存在。

trans-unit.source: If no appropriate handle can be found, the Invoke method will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到任何合适的句柄，调用方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions that are raised during the call will be propagated back to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 在调用期间引发的异常将传播回调用方。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In addition to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: Invoke, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>属性，在控件上都是线程安全的四种方法︰ 调用， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>是否已创建控件句柄。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>在后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致跨线程调用的非法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有其他方法调用，你应使用 invoke 方法之一进行封送处理对控件的线程的调用。

trans-unit.source: The delegate can be an instance of <xref:System.EventHandler>, in which case the sender parameter will contain this control, and the event parameter will contain <xref:System.EventArgs.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 委托可以是的<xref:System.EventHandler>在这种情况下发件人参数将包含此控件，并且事件参数将包含<xref:System.EventArgs.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.EventArgs.Empty?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.EventHandler>实例

trans-unit.source: The delegate can also be an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>, or any other delegate that takes a void parameter list.
trans-unit.target: 委托还可以是实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>，或采用 void 参数列表的任何其他委托。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>

trans-unit.source: A call to an <xref:System.EventHandler> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker> delegate will be faster than a call to another type of delegate.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.EventHandler>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>委托会比其他类型的委托调用更快。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker> </xref:System.EventHandler>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果应处理该消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能引发异常。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that contains a method to be called in the control's thread context.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含要在控件的线程上下文中调用的方法的委托。

trans-unit.source: The return value from the delegate being invoked, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the delegate has no return value.
trans-unit.target: 正在调用的委托的返回值或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果委托没有返回值。

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate, on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle, with the specified list of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 在拥有控件的基础窗口句柄，使用指定的参数列表的线程上执行指定的委托。

trans-unit.source: Delegates are similar to function pointers in C or C++ languages.
trans-unit.target: 委托是类似于 C 或 c + + 语言中的函数指针。

trans-unit.source: Delegates encapsulate a reference to a method inside a delegate object.
trans-unit.target: 委托封装对委托对象中的方法的引用。

trans-unit.source: The delegate object can then be passed to code that calls the referenced method, and the method to be invoked can be unknown at compile time.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以传递给调用所引用的方法的代码的委托对象和要调用的方法可以在编译时未知。

trans-unit.source: Unlike function pointers in C or C++, delegates are object-oriented, type-safe, and more secure.
trans-unit.target: 与在 C 或 c + + 中的函数指针，不同委托是面向对象的、 类型安全和更安全。

trans-unit.source: If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的句柄尚不存在，此方法搜索沿控件的父链中，直到它找到的控件或窗体具有窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: If no appropriate handle can be found, this method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到任何合适的句柄，此方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions that are raised during the call will be propagated back to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 在调用期间引发的异常将传播回调用方。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In addition to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A> property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>属性，在控件上都是线程安全的四种方法︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>是否已创建控件句柄。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>在后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致跨线程调用的非法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有其他方法调用，你应使用 invoke 方法之一进行封送处理对控件的线程的调用。

trans-unit.source: The delegate can be an instance of <xref:System.EventHandler>, in which case the sender parameter will contain this control, and the event parameter will contain <xref:System.EventArgs.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 委托可以是的<xref:System.EventHandler>在这种情况下发件人参数将包含此控件，并且事件参数将包含<xref:System.EventArgs.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.EventArgs.Empty?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.EventHandler>实例

trans-unit.source: The delegate can also be an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>, or any other delegate that takes a void parameter list.
trans-unit.target: 委托还可以是实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>，或采用 void 参数列表的任何其他委托。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>

trans-unit.source: A call to an <xref:System.EventHandler> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker> delegate will be faster than a call to another type of delegate.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.EventHandler>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker>委托会比其他类型的委托调用更快。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MethodInvoker> </xref:System.EventHandler>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果应处理该消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能引发异常。

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes parameters of the same number and type that are contained in the `args` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 采用的相同的数量和中包含的类型参数的方法的委托`args`参数。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the specified method.
trans-unit.target: 要作为参数传递的指定方法的对象数组。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the method takes no arguments.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果方法不采用任何参数。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the return value from the delegate being invoked, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the delegate has no return value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>包含正在调用的委托的返回值或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果委托没有返回值。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus"></xref> event for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus"></xref>为指定的控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to assign the event to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>要分配到的事件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus"></xref> event for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus"></xref>为指定的控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the caller must call an invoke method when making method calls to the control because the caller is on a different thread than the one the control was created on.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否进行到控件的方法调用，因为调用方是与一个不同的线程上的控件上创建时，调用方必须调用 invoke 方法。

trans-unit.source: Controls in Windows Forms are bound to a specific thread and are not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Windows 窗体中的控件绑定到特定线程，不是线程安全。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you are calling a control's method from a different thread, you must use one of the control's invoke methods to marshal the call to the proper thread.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果要从另一个线程调用控件的方法，你必须使用其中一个控件的调用封送到合适的线程调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to determine if you must call an invoke method, which can be useful if you do not know what thread owns a control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以用于确定是否必须调用 invoke 方法，这会非常有用，如果你不知道在哪个线程拥有一个控件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In addition to the InvokeRequired property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe to call: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> if the handle for the control has already been created.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 除了 InvokeRequired 属性中，还有一些在控件上都是线程安全地调用的四个方法︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>是否已创建控件句柄。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.EndInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A> before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>在后台线程上创建控件的句柄之前可能会导致跨线程调用的非法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateGraphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: For all other method calls, you should use one of these invoke methods when calling from a different thread.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有其他方法调用，应使用以下方法之一从另一个线程调用时调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: If the control's handle does not yet exist, InvokeRequired searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的句柄尚不存在，InvokeRequired 搜索控件的父链向上，直到它找到的控件或窗体具有窗口句柄。

trans-unit.source: If no appropriate handle can be found, the InvokeRequired method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以找到没有相应的句柄，InvokeRequired 方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: This means that InvokeRequiredcan return `false` if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> is not required (the call occurs on the same thread), or if the control was created on a different thread but the control's handle has not yet been created.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，InvokeRequiredcan 可返回`false`如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>不是必需的 （调用发生在同一线程），或如果已创建该控件在不同线程的创建，但尚未创建控件的句柄。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the case where the control's handle has not yet been created, you should not simply call properties, methods, or events on the control.
trans-unit.target: 在控件的句柄尚未创建的情况下，你不应只需调用属性、 方法或事件在控件上。

trans-unit.source: This might cause the control's handle to be created on the background thread, isolating the control on a thread without a message pump and making the application unstable.
trans-unit.target: 这可能会导致在隔离而无需消息泵线程上的控件并使该应用程序不稳定的后台线程上创建控件的句柄。

trans-unit.source: You can protect against this case by also checking the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A> when InvokeRequired returns `false` on a background thread.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过还检查的值来避免这种情况<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>当 InvokeRequired 返回`false`后台线程上。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the control handle has not yet been created, you must wait until it has been created before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未创建控件句柄，必须等待，直到在调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BeginInvoke%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>之前已创建

trans-unit.source: Typically, this happens only if a background thread is created in the constructor of the primary form for the application (as in `Application.Run(new MainForm())`, before the form has been shown or `Application.Run` has been called.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，会发生此情况仅在应用程序的主窗体的构造函数中创建后台线程 (如`Application.Run(new MainForm())`，然后显示窗体或`Application.Run`已调用。

trans-unit.source: One solution is to wait until the form's handle has been created before starting the background thread.
trans-unit.target: 一种解决方案是等待，直到在开始后台线程之前已创建窗体的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Either force handle creation by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> property, or wait until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event to start the background process.
trans-unit.target: 请通过调用强制创建句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>属性，或者等待<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件启动后台进程。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: An even better solution is to use the `SynchronizationContext` returned by <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext> rather than a control for cross-thread marshaling.
trans-unit.target: 更好的解决方案是使用`SynchronizationContext`返回<xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>而不是用于跨线程封送处理的控件。</xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果应处理该消息的线程不再处于活动状态，则可能引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For more information about multithreaded Windows Forms controls, see [How to: Use a Background Thread to Search for Files](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Make Thread-Safe Calls to Windows Forms Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关多线程 Windows 窗体控件的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 使用后台线程搜索文件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[如何︰ 向 Windows 窗体控件进行线程安全的调用](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*> was created on a different thread than the calling thread (indicating that you must make calls to the control through an invoke method); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*>在与调用线程 （说明您必须通过 invoke 方法进行到控件的调用） 不同的线程上创建的; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is visible to accessibility applications.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否可见辅助功能应用程序。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is visible to accessibility applications; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件对辅助功能应用程序; 是否可见否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否已释放。

trans-unit.source: When this property returns `true`, the control is disposed of and can no longer be referenced as a valid Windows control.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性返回`true`，该控件的释放，不再作为有效的 Windows 控件被引用。

trans-unit.source: Even though the instance of a control is disposed of, it is still maintained in memory until it is removed from memory through garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 即使控件的实例已释放，它仍保留在内存中直到从通过垃圾回收的内存中删除。

trans-unit.source: When a control is disposed, you cannot call its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 当释放一个控件时，不能调用其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has been disposed of; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件已经被释放的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has a handle associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否有与之关联的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsHandleCreated property to determine whether <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> has been called.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IsHandleCreated 属性来确定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A>已调用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a handle has been assigned to the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果向控件，则分配了句柄否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines if a character is an input character that the control recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 确定字符是否是控件可识别的输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: Call the IsInputChar method to determine whether the character specified by the `charCode` parameter is an input character that the control wants.
trans-unit.target: 调用 IsInputChar 方法，以确定指定的字符是否`charCode`参数为控件需要的输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the specified input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the control.
trans-unit.target: 在窗口消息预处理，以确定是否应经过预处理，或直接向控件发送指定的输入的字符过程中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If IsInputChar returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IsInputChar 返回`true`，直接向控件发送指定的字符。

trans-unit.source: If IsInputChar returns `false`, the specified character is preprocessed and only sent to the control if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IsInputChar 返回`false`，预处理和仅发送到控件，如果它不使用预处理阶段时指定的字符。

trans-unit.source: The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.
trans-unit.target: 字符的预处理包括检查的字符是否另一个控件的助记键。

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character should be sent directly to the control and not preprocessed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字符应直接发送到控件且不必经过预处理，;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是常规输入的键还是需要预处理的特殊键。

trans-unit.source: Call the IsInputKey method to determine whether the key specified by the `keyData` parameter is an input key that the control wants.
trans-unit.target: 调用 IsInputKey 方法，以确定指定的键是否`keyData`参数是控件需要输入的键。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the specified input key should be preprocessed or sent directly to the control.
trans-unit.target: 在窗口消息预处理，以确定是否应经过预处理，或直接向控件发送指定的输入的键过程中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If IsInputKey returns `true`, the specified key is sent directly to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IsInputKey 返回`true`，直接向控件发送指定的键。

trans-unit.source: If IsInputKey returns `false`, the specified key is preprocessed and only sent to the control if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IsInputKey 返回`false`，指定的键是预处理，如果它不使用预处理阶段时仅向控件发送。

trans-unit.source: Keys that are preprocessed include the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, and RIGHT ARROW keys.
trans-unit.target: 经过预处理的密钥包括选项卡、 返回、 ESC、 和的向上箭头、 向下箭头、 向左键和向右箭头键。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的键是常规输入的键;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the CAPS LOCK, NUM LOCK, or SCROLL LOCK key is in effect.
trans-unit.target: 确定 CAPS LOCK、 NUM LOCK 或 SCROLL LOCK 键是否有效。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsKeyLocked property to determine whether the CAPS LOCK, NUM LOCK, or SCROLL LOCK keys are on, whether individually or in combination.
trans-unit.target: IsKeyLocked 属性用于确定 CAPS LOCK、 NUM LOCK 或 SCROLL LOCK 键是否，是否单独或组合。

trans-unit.source: The CAPS LOCK, NUM LOCK, or SCROLL LOCK member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: CAPS LOCK、 NUM LOCK 或 SCROLL LOCK 成员<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key or keys are in effect; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的一个或多个键在起作用;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The keyVal parameter refers to a key other than the CAPS LOCK, NUM LOCK, or SCROLL LOCK key.
trans-unit.target: keyVal 参数引用与 CAPS LOCK、 NUM LOCK 或 SCROLL LOCK 键不同的键。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control is mirrored.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否为镜像。

trans-unit.source: A mirrored control displays both layout and text from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 镜像的控件显示布局和从右到左的文本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create Mirrored Windows Forms and Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7c5c4ecc-9bfb-4508-8383-753e306719b1).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 创建镜像 Windows 窗体和控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7c5c4ecc-9bfb-4508-8383-753e306719b1)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is mirrored; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件镜像;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified character is the mnemonic character assigned to the control in the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的字符是否为分配给指定的字符串中的控件的助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: The mnemonic character is the character immediately following the first instance of "&" in a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 助记键字符是紧跟第一个实例中<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>的"."字符

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的字符。

trans-unit.source: The string to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的字符串。

trans-unit.source: if the charCode character is the mnemonic character assigned to the control; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 charCode 字符是分配给控件; 的助记键字符否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 在控件有焦点并且按下某个键时发生。

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: 键事件按下列顺序发生︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: KeyDown 2.
trans-unit.target: KeyDown 2。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>3。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in your form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件而不允许其他控件可以接收键盘事件，将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>中窗体的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>到事件处理方法`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>

trans-unit.source: Certain keys, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys are handled by controls automatically.
trans-unit.target: 自动由控件处理某些键，例如选项卡、 返回、 ESC、 和箭头键。

trans-unit.source: To have these keys raise the KeyDown event, you must override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method in each control on your form.
trans-unit.target: 若要使这些键引发 KeyDown 事件，必须重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>窗体上的每个控件中的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The code for the override of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> would need to determine if one of the special keys is pressed and return a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 重写的代码<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>需要确定按下了某个特殊键，并返回的值`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown> event and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A>property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 而不是重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>方法，你可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown>事件并设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown>

trans-unit.source: To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in your form's KeyPress event-handling method to `true`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 在控件应重新定位其子控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The Layout event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: 子控件添加或删除时的边界的控件更改，以及在出现的其他更改可能会影响控件的布局时，将发生布局事件。

trans-unit.source: The layout event can be suppressed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用抑制布局事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change.
trans-unit.target: 挂起的布局，可在控件上执行多个操作，而无需执行一次布局针对每项更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a Layout event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你调整大小，并将控件移动，每个操作都会引发布局事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a cached instance of the control's layout engine.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的布局引擎的缓存的实例。

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEngine property gets the layout engine for the control's children rather than for the control itself.
trans-unit.target: LayoutEngine 属性获取的布局引擎，为控件的子级而不是该控件本身。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"></xref> for the control's contents.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine"> </xref>控件的内容。

trans-unit.target: 在输入的焦点离开控件时发生。
