trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance, in pixels, between the left edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置以像素为单位，该控件的左边的缘与其容器的工作区左边的缘之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: The Left property value is equivalent to the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 左的属性值等于<xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>的控件属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> and Left property values cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> property value of the control to change.
trans-unit.target: 对所做更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>和 Left 的属性值将导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>要更改的控件的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the distance, in pixels, between the left edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>表示以像素为单位，该控件的左边的缘与其容器的工作区左边的缘之间的距离。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the control relative to the upper-left corner of its container.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置相对于其容器的左上角的控件的左上角的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Point> class is a value type (`Structure` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the upper-left point of the control.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Drawing.Point>类是值类型 (`Structure`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，`struct`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)])，它返回的值，这意味着访问该属性返回的控件的左上角点副本。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: So, adjusting the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Point> returned from this property will not affect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> property values of the control.
trans-unit.target: 因此，调整<xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>或<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>属性<xref:System.Drawing.Point>返回此属性将不会影响<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A>控件的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: To adjust these properties set each property value individually, or set the Location property with a new <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整这些属性分别设置每个属性值，或设置具有新<xref:System.Drawing.Point>。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>的位置属性

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the Location property value represents the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，位置属性值表示的左上角<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>以屏幕坐标。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the upper-left corner of the control relative to the upper-left corner of its container.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，表示相对于其容器的左上角的控件的左上角。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location*>属性值已更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>通过以编程方式修改或通过交互更改属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件之间的空间。

trans-unit.source: Controls receive default values for Margin that are reasonably close to Windows user interface guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 规范的合理即将 Windows 用户界面指南的边距时控件接收默认值。

trans-unit.source: Some adjustments might still be necessary for particular applications.
trans-unit.target: 一些调整可能仍有必要为特定应用程序。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the Margin property on a docked control has no effect on the distance of the control from the the edges of its container.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 停靠控件上设置 Margin 属性已从控件的距离不影响其容器的边缘。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> representing the space between controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>表示控件之间的间距。

trans-unit.target: 在控件边距更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating which of the modifier keys (SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT) is in a pressed state.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示哪个修改键 （SHIFT、 CTRL 和 ALT） 处于按下状态。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating which of the mouse buttons is in a pressed state.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示哪个鼠标按钮处于按下状态。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 当控件失去鼠标捕获时发生。

trans-unit.source: In rare scenarios, you might need to detect unexpected input.
trans-unit.target: 在极少数情况下，你可能需要检测到意外的输入。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider the following scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 例如，考虑以下方案。

trans-unit.source: - During a mouse operation, the user opens the Start menu by pressing the Windows key or CTRL+ESC.
trans-unit.target: -鼠标在操作期间，用户通过按 Windows 键或 CTRL + ESC 打开开始菜单。

trans-unit.source: - During a mouse operation, the user switches to another program by pressing ALT+TAB.
trans-unit.target: -鼠标在操作期间，用户切换到另一个程序通过按 ALT + TAB。

trans-unit.source: - During a mouse operation, another program displays a window or a message box that takes focus away from the current application.
trans-unit.target: -鼠标在操作期间，另一个程序会显示任何窗口或采用焦点离开当前的应用程序的消息框。

trans-unit.source: Mouse operations can include clicking and holding the mouse on a form or a control, or performing a mouse drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标操作可以包括，单击并按住鼠标窗体或控件，或执行鼠标拖动操作。

trans-unit.source: If you have to detect when a form or a control loses mouse capture for these and related unexpected scenarios, you can use the MouseCaptureChanged event.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有来检测何时窗体或控件失去鼠标捕获，对于这些数据和相关的意外情况下，你可以使用 MouseCaptureChanged 事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 用鼠标单击控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Depressing a mouse button when the cursor is over a control typically raises the following series of events from the control: 1.
trans-unit.target: 释放鼠标按钮，当光标通常位于控件上方时引发以下一系列的控件中的事件︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: MouseClick event.
trans-unit.target: MouseClick 事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>

trans-unit.source: For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class.
trans-unit.target: 为此，各种事件不能禁用控件的类中。

trans-unit.source: Two single clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second MouseClick event.
trans-unit.target: 两次发生足够时间，具体由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定将生成的单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>而不是第二个 MouseClick 事件的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件是逻辑上控件的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 它们通常由其他操作，如按 ENTER 键在控件有焦点时引发。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is double clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当控件进行双用鼠标单击时发生。

trans-unit.source: The MouseDoubleClick event occurs when the user depresses a mouse button twice in quick succession when the cursor is over the control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户释放鼠标按钮两次连续快速地，当光标位于控件上方时，则 MouseDoubleClick 事件发生。

trans-unit.source: The time interval that separates two single clicks from a double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 将两次单击与双击分隔开的时间间隔由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定。

trans-unit.source: The following series of events is raised by the control when such a user action takes place: 1.
trans-unit.target: 在这样的用户操作发生时，由控件引发的事件执行以下系列︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: MouseDoubleClick event.
trans-unit.target: MouseDoubleClick 事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>

trans-unit.source: For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class.
trans-unit.target: 为此，各种事件不能禁用控件的类中。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件是逻辑上控件的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: They may be raised by other user actions, such as shortcut key combinations.
trans-unit.target: 它们可能会引发由其他用户操作，如快捷键组合。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针位于控件并按下鼠标按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标事件按下列顺序发生︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>2。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>3。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>/ MouseDown / <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel>4。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>5。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> > [!NOTE] > The following events are not raised for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> class unless there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>, MouseDown, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>1> [!NOTE]&1;> 不会引发以下事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>类，除非没有至少一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>、 MouseDown <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有至少一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>在集合中，以及用户与选项卡控件的标头进行交互 (其中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>名称显示)，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>引发相应的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果用户交互的选项卡页中，客户端区域内<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>引发相应的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针停放在控件上时发生。

trans-unit.source: A typical use of MouseHover is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: MouseHover 的一个典型用途是当鼠标悬停在控件 （"悬停矩形"） 周围的指定区域中控件上时显示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 引发此事件所需的暂停指定以毫秒为单位通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MouseHover event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 定义和检测到门户中的 MouseHover 事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>1> [!NOTE]&1;> 不会引发以下事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>类，除非没有至少一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>和 MouseMove。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有至少一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>在集合中，以及用户与选项卡控件的标头进行交互 (其中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>名称显示)，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>引发相应的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果用户交互的选项卡页中，客户端区域内<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>引发相应的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the mouse cursor in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 获取鼠标光标的位置在屏幕坐标。

trans-unit.source: The MousePosition property returns a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> that represents the mouse cursor position at the time the property was referenced.
trans-unit.target: MousePosition 属性返回<xref:System.Drawing.Point>表示引用属性次鼠标光标位置。</xref:System.Drawing.Point>

trans-unit.source: The coordinates indicate the position on the screen, not relative to the control, and are returned regardless of whether the cursor is positioned over the control.
trans-unit.target: 这些坐标指示的位置在屏幕上，不是相对于控件，并且无论是否将光标定位在控件返回。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the screen are 0,0.
trans-unit.target: 屏幕的左上角的坐标为 0，0。

trans-unit.source: The MousePosition property is identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: MousePosition 属性等同于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Position%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates of the mouse cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the screen.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，它包含鼠标光标相对于屏幕左上角的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is released.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标指针位于控件上并释放鼠标按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: Mouse events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标事件按下列顺序发生︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>2。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> 3.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>3。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover> / <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> / <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>/ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> / <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> 4.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The Name property can be used at run time to evaluate the object by name rather than type and programmatic name.
trans-unit.target: Name 属性可以用于在运行时评估对象由名称而不是类型和编程名称。

trans-unit.source: Because the Name property returns a <xref:System.String> type, it can be evaluated in case-style logic statements (`Select` statement in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `switch` statement in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/add/includes/vcprvc-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: 因为 Name 属性返回<xref:System.String>类型，可以用例样式逻辑语句中对它进行评估 (`Select`中的语句[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，`switch`中的语句[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/add/includes/vcprvc-md.md)])。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The name of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated"></xref> event with a specified region of the control to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invalidated"></xref>具有要使之无效的控件指定区域的事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示要使之无效的区域。

trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSizeChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnAutoSizeChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnAutoSizeChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when a child control is added to the control.
trans-unit.target: 当子控件添加到控件时调用。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: The OnControlAdded method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnControlAdded 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the control of Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 通知 Windows 消息的控件。

trans-unit.source: The OnNotifyMessage method is called if the control's `EnableNotifyMessage` style bit is set in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用 OnNotifyMessage 方法控件的`EnableNotifyMessage`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>设置样式位

trans-unit.source: The `EnableNotifyMessage` style in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> enables the control to be notified when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method receives a Windows message.
trans-unit.target: `EnableNotifyMessage`设置中的样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>使控件能够时获得通知<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>方法接收 Windows 消息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: With this method, semi-trusted controls can listen for Windows messages without enabling them to modify the message.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法，不完全受信任的控件可以但却不允许修改消息侦听的 Windows 消息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> that represents the Windows message.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> ，表示 Windows 消息。

trans-unit.source: After dragging has begun, this method is called repeatedly by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] until the drag operation is either canceled or completed.
trans-unit.target: 拖动开始后，此方法会重复调用[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]直到取消或完成拖动操作。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Override this method if you want to change the point at which dragging is canceled or at which a drop occurs.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 重写此方法，如果你想要更改在哪些拖动操作取消或放置操作发生的点。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets padding within the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件内的空白。

trans-unit.source: For containers such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, the Padding property gets or sets their respective <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DisplayRectangle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关等容器<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>，填充属性获取或设置其各自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DisplayRectangle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DisplayRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPadding%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is equal to its Padding property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPadding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性等于其填充属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPadding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Controls receive default values for Padding that are reasonably close to Windows user interface guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 控件接收默认值的值填充，是相当接近 Windows 用户界面指南。

trans-unit.source: Some adjustments might still be necessary for particular applications.
trans-unit.target: 一些调整可能仍有必要为特定应用程序。

trans-unit.source: All controls that implement <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A> are enlarged by the amount in Padding when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 实现的所有控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A>按数量在填充时扩大<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following controls do not use Padding: - Controls that do not implement <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A> through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A> - Custom controls that directly inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>
trans-unit.target: 以下控件不使用填充:-未实现的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A>-直接从继承的自定义控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser></xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.target: 在重绘控件时发生绘制事件。

trans-unit.source: It passes an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> to the method(s) that handles the Paint event.
trans-unit.target: 它将的一个实例传递<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>到处理绘制事件的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When creating a new custom control or an inherited control with a different visual appearance, you must provide code to render the control by overriding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在创建新的自定义控件或继承的控件时具有不同的可视外观，你必须提供代码以通过重写呈现控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnPaint%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overriding the OnPaint Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Control Painting and Rendering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to apply layout logic to all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 强制控件将布局逻辑应用于其所有子控件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method was called before calling the PerformLayout method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>PerformLayout 方法中，在调用之前调用了方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>取消事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> created are set to `null` if no values were provided when the PerformLayout method was called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs>创建服务器被设置为`null`PerformLayout 方法调用时未提供任何值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to apply layout logic to all its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 强制控件将布局逻辑应用于其所有子控件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method was called before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>方法调用，然后再调<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A>方法，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>取消事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PerformLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `affectedControl` and `affectedProperty` parameters can both be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: `affectedControl`和`affectedProperty`参数可以都设置为`null`。

trans-unit.source: Doing so causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> created to be set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 执行操作将导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs>创建设置为`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedProperty%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs.AffectedControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PreProcessControlState"></xref> values, depending on whether <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and whether <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey*> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar*> are <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Preprocesses keyboard or input messages within the message loop before they are dispatched.
trans-unit.target: 预处理键盘或输入的消息在消息循环内之前被发送。

trans-unit.source: PreProcessMessage is called by the application's message loop to preprocess input messages before they are dispatched.
trans-unit.target: PreProcessMessage 称为应用程序的消息循环，以预处理输入的消息之前被发送。

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the `msg` parameter are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值有`msg`参数是 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_CHAR 和 WM_SYSCHAR。

trans-unit.source: When overriding PreProcessMessage, a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the message.
trans-unit.target: 在重写 PreProcessMessage，控件应返回`true`以指示它已处理完该消息。

trans-unit.source: For messages that are not processed by the control, the result of `base.PreProcessMessage` should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 不会处理由控件的结果的消息`base.PreProcessMessage`应返回。

trans-unit.source: Controls will typically override one of the more specialized methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A> instead of overriding PreProcessMessage.
trans-unit.target: 控件通常将如替代更专用的方法之一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A>而不是重写 PreProcessMessage。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessCmdKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>，按引用传递，表示要处理的消息。

trans-unit.source: The possible values are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值为 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_CHAR 和 WM_SYSCHAR。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果消息已由控件; 处理否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref> event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.
trans-unit.target: 之前发生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown"></xref>当焦点位于此控件上按下某个键时的事件。

trans-unit.source: Some key presses, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys, are typically ignored by some controls because they are not considered input key presses.
trans-unit.target: 通常由某些控件忽略某些按键操作，例如选项卡、 返回、 ESC、 和箭头键，因为它们被视为不输入键击。

trans-unit.source: For example, by default, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> control ignores the arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 例如，默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>控件将忽略箭头键。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Pressing the arrow keys typically causes the focus to move to the previous or next control.
trans-unit.target: 通常按箭头键会导致焦点将移动到上一页或下一页控件。

trans-unit.source: The arrow keys are considered navigation keys and pressing these keys typically do not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event for a<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 箭头键被视为导航键，并且通常按这些密钥不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>事件</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: However, pressing the arrow keys for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> does raise the PreviewKeyDown event.
trans-unit.target: 但是，按箭头键<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>会引发 PreviewKeyDown 事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: By handling the PreviewKeyDown event for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A> property to `true`, you can raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event when the arrow keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: 通过处理的 PreviewKeyDown 事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>和设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A>属性`true`，你可以将提升<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>按箭头键时的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PreviewKeyDownEventArgs.IsInputKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: However, if you handle the arrow keys, the focus will no longer move to the previous or next control.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果处理箭头键，则焦点将无法再移到上一页或下一页控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: 处理命令键。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys.
trans-unit.target: 在消息预处理以处理命令键过程中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys.
trans-unit.target: 命令键是始终优先于常规输入键的键。

trans-unit.source: Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: 命令键的示例包括快捷键和菜单快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key.
trans-unit.target: 该方法必须返回`true`以指示它已处理命令键，或`false`以指示该密钥不是命令键。

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 仅当控件承载在 Windows 窗体应用程序或作为 ActiveX 控件，才能调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The ProcessCmdKey method first determines whether the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, and if so, enables the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> to process the command key.
trans-unit.target: ProcessCmdKey 方法首先确定控件是否有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>，如果是这样，启用和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>来处理命令键。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If the command key is not a menu shortcut and the control has a parent, the key is passed to the parent's ProcessCmdKey method.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令键不是菜单快捷方式，且该控件有父级，则将键传递给父级的 ProcessCmdKey 方法。

trans-unit.source: The net effect is that command keys are "bubbled" up the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 净效果是密钥上的控件层次结构"传"该命令。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the key the user pressed, the key data also indicates which, if any, modifier keys were pressed at the same time as the key.
trans-unit.target: 除了用户按下的键，密钥数据还指示哪些，如果有的话，同时按下修改键作为键的同一时间。

trans-unit.source: Modifier keys include the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: 修改键包括 SHIFT、 CTRL 和 ALT 键。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>，按引用传递，表示要处理的窗口消息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>这些值表示要处理的键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字符已由控件; 处理否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog character.
trans-unit.target: 处理对话框字符。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters, such as control mnemonics.
trans-unit.target: 在预处理以处理对话框字符，例如控件的助记键的消息过程中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the character.
trans-unit.target: 仅当调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>方法指示控件未在处理字符。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogChar method simply sends the character to the parent's ProcessDialogChar method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: ProcessDialogChar 方法只需将字符发送到父级的 ProcessDialogChar 方法，或返回`false`如果控件具有没有父级。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog characters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类重写此方法以执行实际处理对话框字符。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 仅当控件承载在 Windows 窗体应用程序或作为 ActiveX 控件，才能调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字符已由控件; 处理否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: 处理对话框键。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters, such as TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: 消息以处理对话框字符，例如 TAB、 返回、 ESC、 键和箭头键在预处理期间调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: 仅当调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>方法指示控件未在处理该键。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogKey simply sends the character to the parent's ProcessDialogKey method, or returns `false`if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: ProcessDialogKey 只需将字符发送到父级的 ProcessDialogKey 方法，或返回`false`如果控件具有没有父级。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类重写此方法以执行实际处理对话框键。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 仅当控件承载在 Windows 窗体应用程序或作为 ActiveX 控件，才能调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>这些值表示要处理的键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果键已由控件; 处理否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes a key message and generates the appropriate control events.
trans-unit.target: 处理键消息并生成适当的控件事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 当控件接收键盘消息时调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The method is responsible for generating the appropriate key events for the message by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 方法负责通过调用生成的消息的相应密钥事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyUp%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message that must be processed.
trans-unit.target: `m`参数包含必须处理的窗口消息。

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, WM_SYSKEYUP, and WM_IME_CHAR.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是 WM_CHAR、 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_KEYUP、 WM_SYSKEYUP 和 WM_IME_CHAR。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>，按引用传递，表示要处理的窗口消息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果消息已由控件; 处理否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 处理键盘消息。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 当控件接收键盘消息时调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The method first determines whether the control has a parent; if so, it calls the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 该方法首先确定控件是否有父项;如果是，则调用父级<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A> method does not process the message then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs%2A> method is called to generate the appropriate keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: 如果父级<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>方法不会处理消息则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs%2A>调用方法来生成相应的键盘事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyEventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message that must be processed.
trans-unit.target: `m`参数包含必须处理的窗口消息。

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是 WM_CHAR、 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_KEYUP 和 WM_SYSKEYUP。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>，按引用传递，表示要处理的窗口消息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果消息已由控件; 处理否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Previews a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 预览键盘消息。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by a child control when the child control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 当子控件接收键盘消息时，将由子控件调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The child control calls this method before generating any keyboard events for the message.
trans-unit.target: 子控件生成消息的任何键盘事件前调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the child control considers the message processed and does not generate any keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法返回`true`，子控件会考虑处理消息并不会生成任何键盘事件。

trans-unit.source: The `m` parameter contains the window message to preview.
trans-unit.target: `m`参数包含要预览的窗口消息。

trans-unit.source: Possible values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是 WM_CHAR、 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_KEYUP 和 WM_SYSKEYUP。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Msg%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessKeyPreview method simply sends the character to the parent's ProcessKeyPreview method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: ProcessKeyPreview 方法只需将字符发送到父级的 ProcessKeyPreview 方法，或返回`false`如果控件具有没有父级。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>类重写此方法以执行实际处理对话框键。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>，按引用传递，表示要处理的窗口消息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果消息已由控件; 处理否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 处理助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法以使控件有机会处理助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 方法应确定控件是否处于处理助记键的状态，以及是否给定的字符是否表示助记键。

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过因此，此方法应执行与助记键并返回关联的操作`true`。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，该方法应返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用此方法的实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>方法来确定给定的字符是否与助记键在控件的文本相匹配。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example: ```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` This default implementation of the ProcessMnemonic method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 例如︰ ```c# if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` ProcessMnemonic 方法此默认实现只返回`false`以指示该控件具有没有助记键。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字符已由控件; 处理作为助记键否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the product name of the assembly containing the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含控件的程序集的产品名称。

trans-unit.source: The ProductName property is a read-only property.
trans-unit.target: ProductName 属性是只读的属性。

trans-unit.source: To change the value of this property, set the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute.Product%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改此属性的值，设置<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute.Product%2A>属性值的<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute>。</xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute> </xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyProductAttribute.Product%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following line of C# code sets the ProductName property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 C# 代码行将设置 ProductName 属性。

trans-unit.source: ``` [assembly: AssemblyProduct("MyApplication")] ``` > [!NOTE] > It is strongly recommended that you provide the company name, product name, and product version.
trans-unit.target: ``` [assembly: AssemblyProduct("MyApplication")] ``` > [!NOTE]1> 强烈建议你提供公司名称、 产品名称和产品版本。

trans-unit.source: Providing this information enables the use of Windows Forms features such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> that make it easier to write applications that comply with the "Certified for Windows" program.
trans-unit.target: 提供此信息启用的 Windows 窗体功能的使用如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，使其更轻松地写入应用程序符合"Certified for Windows"程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Certified for Windows program, see http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification.
trans-unit.target: 有关 Certified for Windows 程序的详细信息，请参阅 http://msdn.microsoft.com/certification。

trans-unit.source: The ProductVersion property is a read-only property.

trans-unit.source: The following line of C# code sets the ProductVersion property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 C# 代码行将设置返回的 ProductVersion 属性。

trans-unit.target: ``` [assembly: AssemblyVersion("1.0.1")] ``` > [!NOTE]1> 强烈建议你提供公司名称、 产品名称和产品版本。

trans-unit.source: Providing this information enables the use of Windows Forms features such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.UserAppDataPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> that make it easier to write applications that comply with the "Certified for Windows" program.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> is providing help to accessibility applications.

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to enable users to invoke help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key.
trans-unit.target: 应使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>类以使用户能够通过按 F1 键来调用你可访问的对象的帮助。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> provides you with complete information in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>可为你在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>的完整信息提供</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 拖放操作期间发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: The QueryContinueDrag event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: QueryContinueDrag 事件在拖放操作期间键盘或鼠标按钮状态更改时引发。

trans-unit.source: The QueryContinueDrag event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: QueryContinueDrag 事件允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 下面介绍如何以及何时引发与拖放操作相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the control under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>方法确定当前光标位置下的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 然后检查以确定控件是否有效的放置目标。

trans-unit.source: If the control is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件是有效的放置目标，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>产生指定的拖放效果引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关拖放效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked.
trans-unit.target: 中的鼠标光标位置、 键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态的更改进行跟踪。

trans-unit.source: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果用户移出一个窗口，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标进入另一个控件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>引发该控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个控件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, theQueryContinueDrag event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态的更改，theQueryContinueDrag 事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据，或取消该操作基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>事件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>的值

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Continue`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>引发事件以继续操作和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>产生新效果引发事件，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>事件成对发生，以便用户当鼠标移到放置目标时，提供有关鼠标位置的最新反馈。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Drop`、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Cancel`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: By default, the QueryContinueDrag event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to `Cancel` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> if the ESC key was pressed and sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to `Drop` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，设置 QueryContinueDrag 事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>到`Cancel`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>曾按下 ESC 键，并设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>到`Drop`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>如果按左、 中间，或向右鼠标左键。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Forces the re-creation of the handle for the control.
trans-unit.target: 强制重新创建控件的句柄。

trans-unit.source: The RecreateHandle method is called whenever parameters are needed for a new control, but using a call from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateStyles%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> is insufficient.
trans-unit.target: 每当参数都需要用于新控件，就会调用 RecreateHandle 方法但使用的从调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateStyles%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>不足。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method also calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DestroyHandle%2A> and<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> and sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法也会调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DestroyHandle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A>和设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A>到`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreatingHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DestroyHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control is currently re-creating its handle.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件当前在重新创建其句柄。

trans-unit.source: The RecreatingHandle property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A> method is still running on the control.
trans-unit.target: RecreatingHandle 属性返回`true`如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>方法仍在运行在控件上。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RecreateHandle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is currently re-creating its handle; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件当前在重新创建其句柄;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Reflects the specified message to the control that is bound to the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: 反映到绑定到指定的句柄的控件指定的消息。

trans-unit.source: The ReflectMessage method is an infrastructure method and typically should not be called from your code.
trans-unit.target: ReflectMessage 方法是一种基础结构方法，并通常不应调用在代码中。

trans-unit.source: If the `hWnd` parameter does not represent a valid control, the ReflectMessage method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`hWnd`参数不表示有效的控制，ReflectMessage 方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Because Windows messages are returned to the top-level window, the ReflectMessage method is used to propagate the return message to the control that sent the message.
trans-unit.target: Windows 消息返回到顶级窗口，因为 ReflectMessage 方法用于传播到发送消息的控件返回的消息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> representing the handle of the control to reflect the message to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IntPtr>表示要反射消息的控件的句柄。</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> representing the Windows message to reflect.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>表示要反映的 Windows 消息。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was reflected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已反映消息;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 强制控件使其工作区无效并立即重绘自己和任何子控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the window region associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与控件关联的窗口区域。

trans-unit.source: The window region is a collection of pixels within the window where the operating system permits drawing.
trans-unit.target: 窗口区域是操作系统允许其中进行绘画的窗口中的像素为单位的集合。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not display any portion of a window that lies outside of the window region.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统不显示窗口位于外部的窗口区域的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of a control's region are relative to the upper-left corner of the control, not the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的坐标是区域的相对于控件不控件的客户端区域的左上角。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The collection of pixels contained with the region can be noncontiguous.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的像素与区域包含的集合可以是不连续。

trans-unit.source: The window <xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref> associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 窗口<xref href="System.Drawing.Region"></xref>与控件关联。
