trans-unit.source: Resets the control to handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 重置控件以处理<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 重置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>为其默认值的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*> property to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 重置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*>为其默认值的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*>

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method if you are either creating a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> or creating your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你创建的设计器<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>或创建你自己控制合并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>通常使用此方法

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 当调整控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the registered <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler> method to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: 若要确定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>的调整大小的控件，可以强制转换`sender`参数的已注册<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>并获取其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>属性 (或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>属性单独)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlEventHandler> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event instead of the Resize event.
trans-unit.target: 若要处理自定义布局，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>而不是调整大小事件的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event is raised in response to a Resize event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>导致响应调整大小事件，而且会导致响应其他影响控件的布局更改引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control redraws itself when resized.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件重绘自己在调整大小时。

trans-unit.source: The ResizeRedraw property value is equivalent to the return value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> method when passing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> value as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: ResizeRedraw 属性值等于的返回值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>方法中传递时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>作为参数的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control redraws itself when resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件重绘自己在调整大小时;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Resumes usual layout logic.
trans-unit.target: 恢复正常的布局逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Calling the ResumeLayout method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有任何挂起的布局请求，调用 ResumeLayout 方法强制立即进行布局。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and ResumeLayout methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和 ResumeLayout 方法相继配合使用以禁止显示多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>事件时调整控件的多个属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the ResumeLayout method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你通常应该调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>方法，然后设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>属性的控件，然后调用 ResumeLayout 方法，以便使更改生效。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> for ResumeLayout to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: 必须有没有挂起的调用到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>ResumeLayout 成功调用的。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resumes usual layout logic, optionally forcing an immediate layout of pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: 恢复正常的布局逻辑，可以选择强制的挂起的布局请求立即进行布局。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法强制立即进行布局，如果有任何挂起的布局请求。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `performLayout` parameter is set to `true`, an immediate layout occurs if there are any pending layout requests.
trans-unit.target: 当`performLayout`参数设置为`true`，如果有任何挂起的布局请求，则会发生对立即进行布局。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法相继配合使用以禁止显示多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>事件时调整控件的多个属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你通常应该调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>方法，然后设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>属性的控件，，然后调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法，以使更改生效。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: 必须有没有挂起的调用到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>成功调用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> method before initializing the controls to be added.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 在几个控件添加到父控件时，建议您调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>方法之前初始化要添加的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After adding the controls to the parent control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在将控件添加到父控件之后, 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.
trans-unit.target: 这将增加有许多控件的应用程序的性能。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to execute pending layout requests; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要执行挂起的布局请求;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the distance, in pixels, between the right edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: 获取以像素为单位，该控件的右边缘与其容器的工作区左边的缘之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: The value of the Right property is equal to the sum of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> property value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 其右边缘属性的值等于的总和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>属性值和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Right property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 其右边缘属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: You can change this property value indirectly by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties or calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过更改的值间接更改此属性的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>属性或调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetClientSizeCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.UpdateBounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBoundsCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetBounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the distance, in pixels, between the right edge of the control and the left edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>表示以像素为单位，该控件的右边缘与其容器的工作区左边的缘之间的距离。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether control's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将控件的元素对齐以支持使用从右向左的字体的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeft property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: RightToLeft 属性是环境的属性。

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>都不具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>作为其父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>默认情况下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>类或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>类概述。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeft property is used for international applications where the language is written from right to left, such as Hebrew or Arabic.
trans-unit.target: RightToLeft 属性用于国际应用程序语言从右到左，例如希伯来语或阿拉伯语写入的位置。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>, control elements that include text are displayed from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>，从右到左显示包含文本的控件元素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value of the RightToLeft property is changed at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> RightToLeft 属性的值在运行时更改，如果保留仅原始文本不带格式。

trans-unit.source: The following are a few examples of how control elements are affected by the RightToLeft property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName> : - Vertical scroll bars are displayed on the left side rather than right side of scrollable controls (for example, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>).
trans-unit.target: 以下是一些示例的 RightToLeft 属性值如何影响控件元素<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>:-垂直滚动条显示在左边而不是可滚动控件的右侧 (例如， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>、 多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - Horizontal scroll bars start with the scroll box (thumb) right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: -水平滚动条的初始滚动框 （缩略图） 右对齐。

trans-unit.source: - The check box element alignment, controlled by the `CheckAlign` property, is reversed for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: -的复选框元素对齐方式，由控制`CheckAlign`属性，将反转以进行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: - Items in list box, combo box, and up-down controls are right aligned.
trans-unit.target: 的右对齐列表框、 组合框和 up-down 控件中的项。

trans-unit.source: - Up and down buttons are left-aligned on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> controls.
trans-unit.target: -向上或向下按钮为上的左对齐<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DomainUpDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>

trans-unit.source: - Menus (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>) are displayed right-aligned.
trans-unit.target: -菜单 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>) 右对齐显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: - The alignment of toolbar buttons on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control or the alignment of text on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> is not affected by the RightToLeft property.
trans-unit.target: 的上的工具栏按钮对齐方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>控件或上文本的对齐方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton>RightToLeft 属性不会影响。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBarButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> supports right-to-left alignment; however, the effect on an ActiveX control depends on the extent to which the control author implemented support for right-to-left display.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>支持从右到左对齐方式; 但是，对 ActiveX 控件的影响程度上取决于向其控件作者实现对从右到左显示支持的范围。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 所赋的值不是之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>属性值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> to the appropriate <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> to support right-to-left text.
trans-unit.target: 将转换指定<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>到相应<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>以支持从右向左的文本。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> is set to `No`, the return value is equal to the `align` parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>设置为`No`，返回的值是否等于`align`传递单元参数</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> to the appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> to support right-to-left text.
trans-unit.target: 将转换指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>到相应<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>以支持从右向左的文本。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> is set to `No`, the return value is equal to the `align` parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>设置为`No`，返回的值是否等于`align`传递单元参数</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Scales the control and all child controls by the specified scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: 按指定的刻度因子缩放控件及其所有子控件。

trans-unit.source: The Scale method scales the control by the specified scaling `factor`.
trans-unit.target: 扩展方法按指定的比例缩放控件`factor`。

trans-unit.source: It also recursively scales all child controls if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 它还以递归方式将所有子控件，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> to scale each control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在内部调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>缩放每个控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"></xref> containing the horizontal and vertical scaling factors.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.SizeF"> </xref>包含水平和垂直比例因子。

trans-unit.source: Scales the control and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 缩放控件和任何子控件。

trans-unit.source: The ratio to use for scaling.
trans-unit.target: 用于缩放比率。

trans-unit.source: Scales the entire control and any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 缩放整个控件和任何子控件。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: 水平比例因子。

trans-unit.source: The vertical scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: 垂直比例因子。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines the scaling of child controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，确定子控件的缩放。

trans-unit.source: If the ScaleChildren property is `true`, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A> method will recursively call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> method of each of its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ScaleChildren 属性为`true`，则<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A>方法将以递归方式调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A>的各个子控件的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ScaleControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of ScaleChildren always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: ScaleChildren 的默认实现始终返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override ScaleChildren to return `false` to indicate that scaling should not be performed on their children.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类可以重写 ScaleChildren 返回`false`以指示，缩放不应执行在其子控件上。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if child controls will be scaled when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*> method on this control is called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果将子控件扩展时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*>此控件上的方法是调用; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Scale*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: 缩放控件的位置、 大小、 填充和边距。

trans-unit.source: If the control is top level, this will not scale the control's location.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件为顶级，此操作将不缩放控件的位置。

trans-unit.source: This does not scale children or the size of automatically sized controls.
trans-unit.target: 这样做可伸缩性的子级或自动调整大小的控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: You can omit scaling in any direction by changing the value of the `specified` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以忽略任何方向的缩放通过更改的值`specified`参数。

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: 高度和宽度的控件缩放依据因子。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref>值，该值指定要定义其大小和位置时使用的控件的边界。

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: 水平比例因子。

trans-unit.source: The vertical scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: 垂直比例因子。

trans-unit.source: Activates the control.
trans-unit.target: 激活控件。

trans-unit.source: The Select method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: Select 方法激活的控件，如果控件的`Selectable`样式位设置为`true`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>，该列包含在另一个控件中，并且所有其父控件是否可见且已启用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表中的 Windows 窗体控件不是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: 从列表中的控件派生的控件将还不能选择。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control)
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>（当不存在控件中的链接）</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.source: Activates a child control.
trans-unit.target: 激活子控件。

trans-unit.source: Optionally specifies the direction in the tab order to select the control from.
trans-unit.target: （可选） 若要选择从控件的 tab 键顺序中指定的方向。

trans-unit.source: The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls.
trans-unit.target: `directed`和`forward`参数由容器风格的控件。

trans-unit.source: When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select.
trans-unit.target: 当`directed`参数设置为`true`、`forward`参数进行计算以确定哪个控件进行选择。

trans-unit.source: When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected.
trans-unit.target: 当`forward`设置为`true`，则在 tab 键顺序中的下一步控件被选定; 时`false`，选择上一个控件的 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>方法激活的控件，如果控件的`Selectable`样式位设置为`true`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>，该列包含在另一个控件中，并且所有其父控件是否可见且已启用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表中的 Windows 窗体控件不是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: 从列表中的控件派生的控件将还不能选择。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control)
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>（当不存在控件中的链接）</xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>指定要选择; 的控件的方向否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to move forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要向前移动的 tab 键顺序;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>在 tab 键顺序中后移。

trans-unit.source: Activates the next control.
trans-unit.target: 激活下一个控件。

trans-unit.source: The SelectNextControl method activates the next control in the tab order if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: SelectNextControl 方法激活的 tab 键顺序的下一个控件，如果控件的`Selectable`样式位设置为`true`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>，该列包含在另一个控件中，并且所有其父控件是否可见且已启用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表中的 Windows 窗体控件不是可选的。

trans-unit.source: Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable.
trans-unit.target: 从列表中的控件派生的控件将还不能选择。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> (when there is no link present in the control) When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or SelectNextControl methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>（时不存在控件中的链接） 将焦点更改通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>或 SelectNextControl 方法，或通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件︰ 1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> 2.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>2。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>3。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>4。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>5。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>事件将被抑制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>该处开始搜索。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to move forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要向前移动的 tab 键顺序;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>在 tab 键顺序中后移。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to ignore the controls with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要忽略控件左边缘与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include nested (children of child controls) child controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要包括嵌套 （子控件的子级） 子控件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to continue searching from the first control in the tab order after the last control has been reached; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sends the control to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: 将控件发送到 z 顺序的后面。

trans-unit.source: The control is moved to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: 将控件移到 z 顺序的后面。

trans-unit.source: If the control is a child of another control, the child control is moved to the back of the z-order.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件是另一个控件的子级，移动子控件的 z 顺序的底层到。

trans-unit.source: If the control is a top-level control, this method will not work correctly unless the control is active.
trans-unit.target: 如果该控件为顶级控件，此方法将无法正常工作，除非该控件处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: A top-level control is a control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, that is not a child of another control.
trans-unit.target: 顶级控件是一个控件，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，即不子级的另一个控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: An active control is a visible control that has input focus.
trans-unit.target: 活动控件是具有输入焦点一个可见控件。

trans-unit.source: To use the SendToBack method with an inactive, top-level control, first call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A> method on the control.

trans-unit.source: For any parameter not specified, the current value will be used.
trans-unit.target: 对于未指定任何参数，将使用的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Performs the work of setting the specified bounds of this control.
trans-unit.target: 执行设置此控件的指定的边界的工作。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the parameters that correspond to the bounds not included in the `specified` parameter are passed in with their current values.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，对应于中未包括的边界的参数`specified`参数将传递使用其当前值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>, or the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property can be passed in with a reference to the current instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>，或<xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>或<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>属性可以随对控件的当前实例的引用传递。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: However all values passed in are honored and applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: 但是遵守并应用于控件中传递的所有值。

trans-unit.source: The `boundsSpecified` parameter represents the elements of the controls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A> changed by your application.
trans-unit.target: `boundsSpecified`参数表示元素的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>更改你的应用程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control, the `boundsSpecified` parameter value is the `Size` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>的控件，`boundsSpecified`参数值是`Size` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> is adjusted in response to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property being set, the `boundsSpecified` parameter value is the `None` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>在响应中调整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>要设置属性`boundsSpecified`参数值是`None` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified>值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 设置控件的客户端区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The client area starts at the (0, 0) location and extends to the (`x`, `y`) location.
trans-unit.target: 工作区开始 （0，0） 位置和延伸到 (`x`， `y`) 位置。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should not set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，不应设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A>的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"></xref> flag to either <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles"></xref>标志为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Control style bit flags are used to categorize supported behavior.
trans-unit.target: 控件样式位标志可用于进行分类支持的行为。

trans-unit.source: A control can enable a style by calling the SetStyle method and passing in the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit (or bits) and the Boolean value to set the bit(s) to.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以启用通过调用 SetStyle 方法并传递在相应的一种样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>位 （或 bits） 和要设置该位的布尔值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: To determine the value assigned to a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> bit, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> member to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定分配给指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>位，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A>方法并传入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>成员来计算。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Setting the control style bits can substantially change the behavior of the control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 设置控件样式位能够充分地更改控件的行为。

trans-unit.source: Review the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> enumeration documentation to understand the effects of changing the control style bits before calling the SetStyle method.
trans-unit.target: 查看<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>枚举文档以了解在调用 SetStyle 方法之前更改控件样式位的效果。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.target: 将控件设置为指定的可见状态。

trans-unit.target: 通常将重写此方法可以更改控件的可见性行为。

trans-unit.source: Displays the control to the user.
trans-unit.target: 为用户显示控件。

trans-unit.source: Showing the control is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 显示控件等效于设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the Show method is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property returns a value of `true` until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Show 方法调用后，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>属性返回的值`true`直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否应显示聚焦框。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件应显示聚焦框，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的站点。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref>与关联<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>，如果任何。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height and width of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的高度和宽度的控件。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> class is a value type (`Structure` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)]), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Drawing.Size>类是值类型 (`Structure`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，`struct`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/add/includes/csprcs-md.md)])，它返回的值，这意味着访问该属性返回的控件的大小副本。</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: So, adjusting the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> returned from this property will not affect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 因此，调整<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>或<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A>属性<xref:System.Drawing.Size>返回此属性将不会影响<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: To adjust the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> of the control, you must set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> property, or set the Size property with a new <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.
trans-unit.target: 若要调整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>的控件，则必须设置该控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>属性或将以新<xref:System.Drawing.Size>.</xref:System.Drawing.Size>大小属性设置</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To maintain better performance, do not set the <xref:System.Drawing.Size> of a control in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 为了保持更好的性能，不要设置<xref:System.Drawing.Size>处于其构造函数的控件。</xref:System.Drawing.Size>

trans-unit.source: The preferred method is to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 首选的方法是重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> Windows Server 2003 上系统、 大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>受到的最大像素宽度和高度的监视器。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the height and width of the control in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>表示的高度和宽度，以像素为单位的控件。

trans-unit.source: It is preferable to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> event to handle custom layouts.
trans-unit.target: 最好使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>事件来处理自定义布局。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>

trans-unit.source: Temporarily suspends the layout logic for the control.
trans-unit.target: 临时挂起控件的布局逻辑。

trans-unit.source: The layout logic of the control is suspended until the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 控件的布局逻辑被挂起，直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SuspendLayout and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control.
trans-unit.target: SuspendLayout 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法相继配合使用以禁止显示多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout>事件时调整控件的多个属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you would typically call the SuspendLayout method, then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> properties of the control, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method to enable the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你将通常调用 SuspendLayout 方法中，然后设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>属性的控件，，然后调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法，以使更改生效。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: There must be no pending calls to SuspendLayout for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> to be successfully called.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 SuspendLayout 到没有挂起的调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>成功调用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the SuspendLayout method before initializing the controls to be added.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 在几个控件添加到父控件时，建议你初始化要添加的控件之前调用 SuspendLayout 方法。

trans-unit.source: After adding the controls to the parent control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在将控件添加到父控件之后, 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.
trans-unit.target: 这将增加有许多控件的应用程序的性能。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the system colors change.
trans-unit.target: 系统颜色更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors> is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tab order of the control within its container.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件在其容器内的 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: A tab index can consist of any valid integer greater than or equal to zero, lower numbers being earlier in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 选项卡索引可以包含的任何有效的整数大于或等于零，较低数字靠前的 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: If more than one control on the same parent control has the same tab index, the z-order of the controls determines the order to cycle through the controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果在同一个父控件上的多个控件具有相同的选项卡索引，控件的 z 顺序确定的顺序控件循环。

trans-unit.source: For a control to be included in the tab order, its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 控件的 tab 键顺序，包括其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>属性必须设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index value of the control within the set of controls within its container.
trans-unit.target: 在其容器内的控件集内的控件索引值。

trans-unit.source: The controls in the container are included in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 容器中的控件的 tab 键顺序包括。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex*>属性值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this control using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以使用 TAB 键此控件提供焦点。

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 当用户按 TAB 键时，则会将输入的焦点设置为下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。

trans-unit.source: Controls with the TabStop property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 控件的 TabStop 属性值与`false`不包括在 tab 键顺序中的控件集合。

trans-unit.source: The tab order can be manipulated by setting the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置控件的可操作的 tab 键顺序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can give the focus to the control using the TAB key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户可以使用 TAB 键为的控件提供焦点否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property will always return <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>的实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>属性值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains data about the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含有关控件的数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: Any type derived from the <xref:System.Object> class can be assigned to this property.
trans-unit.target: 从派生的任何类型<xref:System.Object>类可以分配给此属性。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If the Tag property is set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过 Windows 窗体设计器设置标记属性，可以分配纯文本。

trans-unit.source: A common use for the Tag property is to store data that is closely associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Tag 属性的一个常见用途是存储与控件密切相关联的数据。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a control that displays information about a customer, you might store a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains the customer's order history in that control's Tag property so the data can be accessed quickly.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有一个控件，显示有关客户的信息，你可能会存储<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，包含该控件的标记属性中的客户的订单历史记录，因此可以快速访问这些数据。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，其中包含有关控件的数据。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此控件关联的文本。

trans-unit.source: The Text property of the control is used differently by each derived class.
trans-unit.target: 每个派生类以不同方式使用控件的文本属性。

trans-unit.source: For example the Text property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is displayed in the title bar at the top of the form, is fairly small in character count, and usually displays the application or document name.
trans-unit.target: 例如的 Text 属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>显示在窗体顶部的标题栏中，在字符计数中，很小，通常会显示的应用程序或文档的名称。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: However, the Text property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> can be large and can include numerous nonvisual characters used to format the text.
trans-unit.target: 但是的 Text 属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>可以很大，并且可以包含多个非可视字符用于设置文本格式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, the text displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> can be formatted by adjusting the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> properties, or by the addition of spaces or tab characters to align the text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在显示的文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>可通过调整格式设置<xref:System.Drawing.Font>属性，或通过添加空格或制表符对齐文本。</xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 与此控件关联的文本。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*>属性值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance, in pixels, between the top edge of the control and the top edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置以像素为单位，该控件上的边缘与其容器的工作区上边缘之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: The Top property value is equivalent to the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> property value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Top 属性值等于<xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>的控件属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and Top property values cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> property value of the control to change.
trans-unit.target: 对所做更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>和 Top 属性值将导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A>要更改的控件的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the distance, in pixels, between the bottom edge of the control and the top edge of its container's client area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>表示以像素为单位，控件下的边缘与其容器的工作区上边缘之间的距离。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent control that is not parented by another Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: 获取没有另一个 Windows 窗体控件的父级的父控件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is the outermost <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref> that the control is contained in.
trans-unit.target: 通常，这是最外面<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>中包含该控件。

trans-unit.source: The top-level control is defined as the parent control that is not parented by another Windows Forms control.
trans-unit.target: 顶级控件被指不是另一个 Windows 窗体控件的父控件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is the outermost <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that the control is contained in.
trans-unit.target: 通常，这是最外层的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>控件包含的单元</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the control is contained on an MDI child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, then the top-level control is the Multiple Document Interface (MDI) parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果上一个 MDI 子<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，然后顶级控件为多文档界面 (MDI) 父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>包含控件

trans-unit.source: If the control is not parented on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, this property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果该控件没有父级上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，此属性将返回`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that represents the top-level control that contains the current control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> ，表示包含当前控件的顶级控件。

trans-unit.source: Causes the control to redraw the invalidated regions within its client area.
trans-unit.target: 使控件重绘其工作区内的无效的区域。

trans-unit.source: Updates the bounds of the control with the current size and location.
trans-unit.target: 用当前大小和位置更新控件的边界。

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control is different from the previous <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>控件是不同于以前<xref:System.Drawing.Size>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> of the control changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>控件更改，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: Updates the bounds of the control with the specified size and location.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小和位置更新控件的边界。

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control if different from the previous <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>如果不同于上一个控件的<xref:System.Drawing.Size>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A> of the control changes, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 同样，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>控件更改，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*> coordinate of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*>坐标的控件。</xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*> coordinate of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*>坐标的控件。</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>的控件。</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>的控件。</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Updates the bounds of the control with the specified size, location, and client size.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的大小、 位置和客户端大小更新控件的控件边界。

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the control is different from the previous <xref:System.Drawing.Size>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>控件是不同于以前<xref:System.Drawing.Size>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged> </xref:System.Drawing.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.target: 同样，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>控件更改，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LocationChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Location%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*>坐标的控件。</xref:System.Drawing.Point.X*>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*>坐标的控件。</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y*>

trans-unit.source: The client <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 客户端<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>的控件。</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The client <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 客户端<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>的控件。</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Forces the assigned styles to be reapplied to the control.
trans-unit.target: 强制将分配的样式重新应用到控件。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> method to get the styles to apply.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>方法以获取要应用的样式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>

trans-unit.source: The styles assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> assigned to the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> property are reapplied.
trans-unit.target: 分配给样式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams>分配给控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A>属性都将重新应用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.ExStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control is repainted to reflect the style changes if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 重新绘制控件以反映样式发生改变，如有必要。

trans-unit.source: The UpdateStyles method has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UpdateStyles 方法起任何作用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>属性值是`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsHandleCreated%2A>

trans-unit.source: Updates the control in its parent's z-order.
trans-unit.target: 更新其父级的 z 顺序中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The UpdateZOrder method updates the position of the control in its parent control's z-order.
trans-unit.target: UpdateZOrder 方法将更新其父控件的 z 顺序控件的位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this control is a newly created control that was added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>, the z-order is updated with the new control added to the back.
trans-unit.target: 例如，新创建的控制此控件是否已添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>，z 顺序更新与新控件添加到背面。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the wait cursor for the current control and all child controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将等待光标用于当前控件以及所有子控件。

trans-unit.source: Use a wait cursor whenever you perform an operation that takes a noticeable amount of time.However, note that operations that block the UI thread will also block acursor change.Therefore, this property should only be used when performing time-consuming operations in another thread.
trans-unit.target: 每当执行需要耗费大量时间操作时，请使用等待光标。但是，请注意，阻塞 UI 线程的操作还将阻止 acursor 更改。因此，仅当在另一个线程中执行耗时的操作时，才应使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: To change the cursor globally and immediately, seethe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要在全局级别并立即更改光标，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the wait cursor for the current control and all child controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要将等待光标用于当前控件以及所有子控件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: 当你通过使用键盘 （选项卡上，按 SHIFT + TAB 等），通过调用更改焦点<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法，或通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>到当前窗体的属性，将按以下顺序发生焦点事件︰ 1。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>属性设置为`false`，验证和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>事件将被抑制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the Validating event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the Validating event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>设置为`true`在验证事件委托中，通常会在验证事件后的所有事件将被都抑制。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Do not attempt to set focus from within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>, Validating, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 不尝试将焦点设置在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>、 验证，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated>事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validated> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding.
trans-unit.target: 这样做会导致你的应用程序或操作系统停止响应。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the `WM_KILLFOCUS` topic in the "Keyboard Input Reference" section, and the "Message Deadlocks" section of the "About Messages and Message Queues" topic in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示该控件及其所有子控件。

trans-unit.source: Note that even if `Visible` is set to `true`, the control might not be visible to the user if it is obscured behind other controls.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，即使`Visible`设置为`true`，该控件可能不会显示给用户如果它被遮盖其他控件。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 处理 Windows 消息。

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the WndProc method after getting filtered through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: The WndProc method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: WndProc 方法完全对应 Windows`WindowProc`函数。
